Summary: We stayed here last minute for a weekend and the staff was amazing! Very accommodating and polite. Parking was free and the room felt really nice for being a basic room. The hard floors were really nice. Our only issue was the shower didn’t drain fast so it would fill up a bit. Other than that loved the room and location.
Manager Response: Dear Katie,  It is really nice to note that you liked the stay and services at our hotel during your recent visit. Glad to see your comments and overall observations which shall definitely drive us for improvement. We look forward to welcoming you again soon!!!   Best Regards,	 Hotel Manager.

Summary: Had to change rooms. Fridge didn’t work,Desk Light missing bulb. TV/remote not working. Strange odor and garbage got piled up outside on the weekend. Staff member who checked me in was very nice concerning challenges. Woman who checked me out was very rude. Make sure you have plenty of Money on your card for incidentals. They must have a lot of problem guests.
Room tip: I think they are all the same little boxes
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I am sorry to learn about all the inconvenience you had to endure.  We care about your experience and I realize no words can change your feelings of disappointment or the inconveniences you experienced. I have shared your comments with the concerned teams and will be retrained to become serious about guest experiences and services. We will look into this further and we greatly appreciate you taking the time to bring this matter to our attention. Guest satisfaction is our commitment and we hope you will give one more opportunity.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: Will overcharge your credit or debit card and apply a 21 day hold on a deposit that exceeds the nightly rate. Rude people that leave you with the impression that you are being hustled. Is in the ghetto of Costa Mesa (not Newport Beach by any stretch). Looks like someone dumped money into a property without regard to continued maintenance. Parking lot is filthy and landscape consists of a few dead palm trees and shrubs. Is a black eye to Choice Hotels.
Manager Response: Hello Guest,  It is disappointing to note that your stay was not satisfactory.  We regret the inconvenience due to many unfortunate reasons.  Our team will check where we went wrong and will take corrective actions for maximum betterment. We shall appreciate your kind understanding and request a rethinking to visit.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: Clean, nice, friendly, professional at front desk offered 5-star customer service in the middle of night. Let me transfer rooms 2x due to my disability & took full responsibility. Also personally came to each room & helped me transfer my stuff. Impressive. Especially during quarantine.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at the BLVD Hotel. It is our sincere endeavor to ensure that our guests enjoy a memorable experience and we are delighted to know that you had a wonderful stay with us. We are very glad to know you were pleased with the hotel overall. Your comments will be shared with our entire staff.  We look forward to hosting your stay once again and continuing to meet your expectations.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary Heading: Make a better choice than this hotel
Summary: Who ever took those photos is a genius. This hotel is a motel and and old decrepit one at that. There has been redecoration but the underlying facility is in very poor condition. The stairwells and balconies made us  feel unsafe and there were open dumpsters and overflowing trash visible from the second floor.  The bed was comfortable. The linens were worn (pilled fabric). The dust ruffle was shredded. The lighting in the room was grim and perhaps that was a good thing. In the daylight the floor ( vinyl plank type) was dirty. Breakfast was adequate. Make a better choice than this motel.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thanks for your stay at the BLVD Hotel. We are very much concerned with your feedback. Our apologies for the bad experience. Our endeavor is to offer a nice stay to all our guests but failed this time. Actions shall be taken to improve everything on priority and you can have a good stay next time. Hope you will reconsider.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: We stayed here for the "great" reviews. By the way - we later found out why they have so many great reviews.  Hotels.com sent us a survey after the trip to rate the hotel. We were out of town on another trip and didn't complete the review, and Hotels.com COMPLETED OUR SURVEY FOR US!!  We received an email stating they'd received our review! When I logged in to look at it, apparently we rated the hotel "great". !! I've tried to get a hold of anyone at hotels.com since then and have had no luck. As for the hotel itself - this is a VERY cheap outside facing motel with a few trendy pics slapped on the wall. If you're young and into the loud party scene, you may think it's "cool", but if you're over 30 and want somewhere you can sleep, it's not for you. You can clearly hear the
Room tip: Rooms on the back side are more quiet, and rooms that aren't adjoining rooms help cut down on...
Manager Response: Hello Savvviness,  It is disappointing to note that your stay was not satisfactory.  We regret the inconvenience due to several issues and bad guest service. Our team will check where we went wrong and will take corrective actions for maximum betterment. Kindly note and give another chance to offer you a nice stay. We shall appreciate your kind understanding.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: Needed to go to Newport Beach area.  After searching for a place to stay, chose the BLVD Hotel.  Hubby and I arrived early morning.  Even though stated check-in was afternoon, we were given a room right away.   The room was clean and nicely up to date. The complimentary breakfast, though not fancy, was quite adequate. I cannot say enough about how great the staff was.  So very friendly, professional and accommodating. Would not hesitate to stay there again!
Manager Response: Hello Guest,  It is wonderful to hear that your stay at the BLVD Hotel was a nice experience.  Thanks to you for appreciating our staff, room, amenities, and food. We are overwhelmed and privileged to have guests like you. Needless to say, we look forward to seeing you back with us again.  Regards, Hotel Manager.

Summary: Location is amazing, close to Knott's Berry Farm (about a 15 min drive), close to the beach (15 min drive)! Restaurants are walking distance (from Italian and Chinese). The hotel/motel is super clean and the staff was amazing!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thanks for the stay and the review. Glad to note that you liked the stay and endorsing your good experience here. We take real pride in welcoming guests like you and offering the very best services to make their stay a memorable one. Please do visit us again.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: This is an upgraded motel. Room door and window opens to the covered walkway and thus cannot open curtains due to the privacy reasons. Good location. Complimentary breakfast was average. Not safe to walk at night. Many restaurants in the nearby area called Triangle.
Manager Response: Hello Navtej,   Thanks for the stay, feedback. and observations We shall definitely work on improving them. You can expect a further improved stay next time. Visit us again soon.   Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: Shod be classified as a motel not a hotel.  Horrible water pressure and  bed skirt was worn and torn. Definitely not worth the cost of the room. Staff however was very friendly and accommodating. Will not return
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thanks for your stay at the BLVD Hotel. We are very much concerned with your feedback. Our apologies for the bad experience. Our endeavor is to offer a nice stay to all our guests but failed this time. Actions shall be taken to improve everything on priority and you can have a good stay next time. Hope you will reconsider.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: (MOTEL) Lipstick on a pig. Old motel with a fresh coat of paint. Old mattresses with nice sheets. Thin walls so noisy rooms. I had a parking lot side room so not only could I hear neighbor's TV, the cars coming and going, alarm beeps and doors slamming insured a restless night's sleep at best. They do have pretty good coffee but the breakfast food is not too good good. Be aware... when I checked out I was charged a "resort fee" (ha ha ha ha) and when I inquired about it I was told that the resort fee was to cover breakfast, wifi, parking all of which are noted on the website as free or complimentary. The staff is very friendly and accomodating and do seem to appreciate your business. This one star MOTEL earned a second star from me because of the staff's hospitality. Although
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for being our guest. We're thrilled that you loved our friendly staff and clean rooms. However, on behalf of our entire team, we apologize that your visit was not exceptional. Thank you for sharing your observations so we may analyze and correct what we did wrong to improve going forward. We hope to have another chance to provide you with the outstanding hospitality you should receive every time you are our guest.  Sincerely Hotel Manager

Summary: The hotel has good visual appeal. However the beds needs to be replaced. They were harder than expected.  The room lighting was poor quality.  The positives were a good variety of breakfast foods and fresh coffee.  The hotel is centrally located to local restaurants and the beach.
Manager Response: Hello Guest,  Thanks for your stay at the BLVD Hotel. I appreciate your feedback and telling us the positive and negative sides of your stay. We shall work further to improve the amenities and hospitality based on your observations. Hope to welcome you again soon,  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: The first room was infested with ants and fruit flies. The second room had urine on the walls and hair on the floor and when I stepped near the minibar I got a small shard of glass lodged in my foot. When I explained the situation to the manager the next day and asked if I could get a refund for the night, instead of being apologetic he got angry and defensive and said “Absolutely not. Is there anything else I can do for you? No? Then have a nice day.” From my experience it seems like a very dirty hotel with an unhelpful manager.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Your feedback shows that there was a complete breakdown with the stay which is really worrisome. This is not at all a regular feature of our hotel and something has gone wrong. We regret the inconveniences but will investigate and based on that will take all possible steps to prevent such an experience to any guest. Guest reviews are serious for us and thank you for your understanding.  Sincerely, Hotel Manager.

Summary: This is much better than the normal Motel like places it compares to. It is finished to a higher standard and a good modern design. The girl at reception was extremely friendly. The rooms are spacious and clean. I will be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place has been updated and is nice Great staff that are very helpful Easy to get on and off I55 freeway Rooms are clean and very comfortable Breakfast was nice, not to much but enough to get going for the day
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not what I expected, but okay
Summary: I’ve heard the BLVD hotels in LA were really cool so when we saw a good deal near Huntington Beach we thought it would be a really fun time. I was able to check in an hour early which was really nice of them. You may only have one car parked there per room, FYI. Staff was friendly at check in and check out. The rooms themselves have definitely been updated and were nice. The pool/hot tub area leaved a little more to be desired for sure. It seemed crammed and there were lots of families. So if you’re stopping here for a night or two on a road trip and have a family, I think it’d be great for that. The kids seemed to have a lot of fun.  It did have more of a motel feeling. And there wasn’t too much close by. It was right near the freeway and our room overlooked a quiet residential
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything was good except the smell in the room. Some kind of deodorant or cleaning fluids. Never went away. Internet service kept going on and off line. Erratic. Very nice restaurants in the area!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us a review of your stay, we are glad you enjoyed your stay, your feedback is important to us as it lets us know where we can improve on. We will look into your concerns and will make the necessary changes. We hope you consider staying with us again whenever you are in the area.

Summary: A good hotel for an overnight stay. The room was modern and clean with a very good shower. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was simple with plenty of choices. A very good location access to major freeways.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for leaving us a review of your stay, we appreciate your business and look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Have stayed at this hotel twice in three months. Good location, clean rooms, very helpful staff. Convient to many attractions in Southern California. Rooms were updated recently and are great. We especially like the walk in showers. However, the water pressure in the shower is weak. Why have a rain head shower with weak pressure. Defeats the purpose.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us a review of your stay. We appreciate you coming back to stay with us and know that your comments will be used to better understand what areas we need to work on. We are currently looking into replacing the shower heads. We hope you continue to choose us next time you are in the area.

Summary: Couldn't get the wifi to work.  It was late when we got in so I didn't bother to call room service.  If I had been able to get wifi I'd have given them 4 stars.  Nice room & the bed was comfortable.  Very fair on the price!  Will come back again.
Manager Response: Hello, fcastro63 Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay with us. We are delighted your stay was a comfortable one, we do want to apologize with the wifi issues you experienced. We will look into our wifi service to make sure it is running to its full potential. Again, thank you for staying with us and we look forward to having you back next time you are in the area.

Summary Heading: Nice Boutique Hotel  - You get more than you pay for.
Summary: I booked this hotel because I live in the SF Bay Area and was picking up a new car for my wife from Fletcher Jones in Newport Beach. I decided to spend the night vs. flying in early and driving back the same day. Since it was a short trip I wanted something nice and quiet but didn’t want to spend a ton of money (the car was a new AMG so I was feeling like I’d already spent enough lol). I travel a lot for business so I’ve got some pretty well defined personal criteria. It’s got to be: clean, comfortable, quiet, good bed, zero drama. Style is a plus. Being a Boutique Coast Brand Hotel: huge plus.  I read all the reviews and looked at the photos. There are a few negative reviews as you’ll find on any property. However at the BLVD the only theme in the negatives reads like the
Manager Response: Hello, Quai_Noi Thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay with us. We are very happy you had a great stay with us and hope you guys are enjoying your new purchase from Fletcher Jones. Next time you are in the area we hope you choose to stay with us again!

Summary: The hotel staff at the hotel was very friendly.  The room was well kept and clean.  My room had a walk in shower which was very nice.  Nice breakfast.  I was very pleased with the hotel for the price.  Location is easy to get to and easy to get to restaurants and stores.
Manager Response: Hi 49joseph14 Thanks for reviewing your stay with us. We are delighted you had a great stay and hope you choose us again next time you are in the area!

Summary: Stayed there once. It was ok so we booked at Hotels.com for a second time. Something came up and we cancelled online in the time allowed to cancel. A week after we were supposed to be there, we find a charge on our credit card for one night. The hotel REFUSED to refund our money so we had to get a refund from Hotels.com directly. They would not work with Hotels.com either. Just be sure that you don't cancel should you book because they are not on the up and up.
Manager Response: none

Summary: SO, this is a back motel right off the freeway... some shady people walk up and down Newport Blvd, so the area is iffy, but the room was clean (a bit to much disinfectant as the room was a bit smelly.. but opened it up and it mostly went away)...  AC worked well, and the staff was excellent..... This is a good one night stay budget motel, but would limit it to a short stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: We really liked this little motel
Summary: Me and my husband had to be in Newport Beach the day after Labor for 5 nights. We had never been to the area before and it was my husband's first time to California. I think of it as a motel because It does look old fashioned but definitely with a modern flair. We needed something not too expensive and it was a good price for Southern California. It was exactly as it appeared online. Our room was lst floor in the back. The front desk let us pick and we wanted to be as far away as possible from the freeway noise. I thought our room was super cool, modern and had everything we needed. I loved the bathroom and especially thought the tile was so nice. Breakfast was good and sufficient. They didn't offer waffles but I loved the eggs and sausage patties. They also had English muffins,
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a great motel  Friendly and helpful staff. The rooms are a good size and look like they have recently been refurbished in a trendy decor.  There is a busy road close by however we did not hear it while sleeping.  Good complimentary breakfast and coffee.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review KiwiFlashpackers. I am so glad to see that you had a wonderful stay that was accommodated with great customer service and our newly renovated rooms and decor. I am happy you were able to take advantage of our breakfast and other hotel amenities. We hope to see you again the next time you are in Costa Mesa.

Summary: It looks clean at first glance but if you have white socks on they will be black by morning. The staff needs to clean better for the price of the room. The staff at front is friendly. The rooms are decorated nicely. The pool was pretty clean.
Manager Response: Peggy I would like to apologize that the hotel did not meet your expectations. We are an exterior property so on windy days it is possible that some dirt did go underneath the doors, but I can guarantee you that my staff cleans the rooms up to the ChoiceHotels standards. We are going to be installing door stoppers to the room to prevent dirt from outside from entering the rooms so future guest would have a memorable stay with us. I am glad to see that you were pleased with our hotel staff and we hope that you would consider staying with us again the next time you are in Costa Mesa.

Summary: We chose this property as it was close to the hospital, where I was having surgery early the next day. The person checking us in was polite and friendly. There was a small bar located off of the lobby and talk of Happy Hour. The housekeeper was pleasant when I requested more towels for the room. The property itself wasn't overly impressive, as it seemed pretty compact, but we were very pleased with the room we got on the first floor. The king sized bed was comfortable, and we had no complaints. My partner stayed for a second night and enjoyed the complimentary breakfast. I never did go to see the swimming pool, which was a short distance beyond our room. The room was more expensive than we would have liked, but considering the area, it was par for the course. I would stay here
Manager Response: Dear Dolly49nut,   Thank you so much for your positive review. I am so glad to see that my staff was able to provide you and your partner with excellent customer service, that you were pleased with our rooms, breakfast and hotel amenities. During the summer our prices do increase because of the Orange County Fair that is happening at the fair grounds about 15 minutes away from us. We do hope to see you again the next time you are in Costa Mesa.

Summary: First the Pros... great breakfast, wonderful updated bathrooms, modern decor. Pillows looked lumpy but were super comfy. Location is near restaurants and the fairgrounds  Now the Cons...I made my reservation months ahead of time. Specifically requested a ground floor room as my hubby and my self have knee problems. We arrive about 5:30 p - so not so late at night that all the rooms were occupied. No ground floor room is available. When I pointed out I requested it months earlier , she looked again and appeared surprised that it was actually written in the reservation. Then she asked did we want to proceed with the check in or look for another motel. No attemp to help. No offer to assist with the bags. No indications that they cared about our business in anyway. We have been
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Don't Let the Location fool You
Summary: Located on hotel row along newport Blvd in Costa mesa this hotel is one of the first to "gentrify" the row of hotels along the blvd.  The rooms are modern, the beds and furniture new and the staff is quite helpful  The front desk manager Brittany  greeted me with a smile and the had already procurred my special request ( I needed 2 extra pillows as I have a bad back) so as soon as i arrived she had them ready and waiting and quickly processed me into my room  Thx Brit
Manager Response: Dear Laffstop,   I am so glad to hear that Brittany was able to provide you with excellent customer service and fulfill your special request. I am glad you were able to enjoy our rooms and hotel amenities that we hope to see you again the next time you are in Orange County.

Summary: I was sceptic about staying here, but wow! The room was immaculate & our stay was peaceful! Like I said, MOTEL, so the neighbors can be heard through the walls & there's not really any nice views. Smaller pool, but it's very clean. The lobby bar is a hidden gem & I was completely excited to let them know that I'd be back.
Manager Response: Dear Christopher,   I am so happy to hear that you were pleased with our boutique hotel and that we were able to impress you with our rooms, pool and other hotel amenities. We are happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of our happy hour everyday from 5pm-7pm of buy one, get free beer on tap, beer bottles, or house wine. We are looking forward to your next visit to Costa Mesa.

Summary: The title would have been too long had I titled it "Stay somewhere else unless you want all of your possessions thrown into thin plastic bags and locked in the lobby closet". My wife, youngest son and I were enjoying our visit to Orange County California until our last morning. My wife asked the front desk person the night before we were leaving if we could be granted a late checkout. The person at the desk was very nice and asked if 12 noon was ok. My wife said that would be great. The next morning we came back to our room to find all of our belongings were gone from the room. This included my wallet, passport, my wife's purse, literally everything, as we had come from the pool. We went to the front desk in our wet bathing suits to see if they knew anything and the lady who was
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Average, no EV charger, nice staff
Summary: Location's rather good, and neighborhood seems relatively safe, although hotel is not quiet. Rooms are small but clean. To become a business hotel, they need to make a few changes:  1. They definitely need to get an 2 EV chargers  2. Clean up the smoker's area in the back - looked kinda gross, especially given proximity to pool.  3. Espresso in lobby would help, given that they've done a lot for beer/wine drinkers  4. Start breakfast at 6am. What business professional eats at 7am on a workday?!
Manager Response: Dear Adam,   I am pleased to see how happy you were with how safe our location is and how clean our rooms are. We have made some changes to the hotel since your last stay with us. We now have 2 EVC chargers and we relocated our smoking area with nice benches and a new ash stand. Since we joined Ascend brand of Choice Hotels in January of this year one of their mandatory requirements is to have breakfast at 7am, unfortunately we will not be able to open it earlier. We do hope that you would re-consider staying with us again the next time you are in Costa Mesa.

Summary: BLVD hotel was more then we thought it was going to be. The staff couldn’t have been more helpful and the stay was extremely comfortable! Plenty of room for 3 adults to fully unpack in the 2 queen  bed rooms!
Manager Response: Dear John,   I'm happy to see that your Disneyland trip was a great success, that you were pleased with our hotel, rooms and customer service. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed one night at BLVD and were very happy with it.  The customer service agent on the front desk was friendly and helpful and gave us detailed directions to various shops in the area we wanted to visit.  They stored our luggage until our room was ready.  The room was clean, tidy and well appointed and the decoration was modern and a bit funky.  The bed was comfortable.  My only complaint was the noisy fan in the shower/toilet.  Parking was right outside the room.  Breakfast the next morning was nice and fresh.  The evening customer service agent on the front desk recommended Filomena's Italian Kitchen to us for dinner which was a 2 minute walk from BLVD - great recommendation - we loved it!  Would definitely stay at BLVD again.
Manager Response: Dear Essjay,   I am happy to hear that we were able to provide you with phenomenal customer service and that they were able to suggest you to various shops and restaurants in the area. We are always more then happy to hold on to your luggage(s) whenever you need us to, that you were pleased with our breakfast and our hotel amenities. I do apologize that the fan in the restroom was a little noisy, I will have my maintenance guy take a look at it so we can create a  much more memorable experience for future guest. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: The hotel is definitely still under construction - the doors and windows are still taped for painting. Check in and check out were quick and painless. The staff was very friendly and nice. The room was comfortable and modern - I liked it a lot. The continental breakfast was quite nice. A few suggestions for management - please add better lighting to the rooms. The overhead lights are much too bright, but the other lights are too dim. And please find a good coffee (the stuff in the rooms and in the breakfast room was dreadful) and replace the Coffee Mate with half & half -- it's a small change that makes a huge difference to people who love coffee. I think this could be a great little hotel if you pay attention to the details. One tip for travelers: there's a lovely cafe about
Manager Response: Dear BB_Mke,   During your stay with us we were in the process of re-painting the exterior of  the property, we do apologize if that may disturbed your stay. I am pleased to see that you were happy with our amazing customer service and that you were happy with our breakfast from 7am-10am.   Thank you so much for your suggestions to provide better lighting in the rooms, and to provide a better coffee brand in the rooms and lobby. We do take our customer suggestions to heart and make changes whenever necessary. We hope to see you again soon so we can provide you with the same amazing customer service.

Summary: So the check in was simple and everyone was very nice at the desk.  The room was modern but not extremely comfortable.  Their was a lot of noise outside and upstairs through the night.  We were not there to party and there were definitely others that were. The breakfast was minimal and crowded. It was OK for one night but I would look at other options next time.
Manager Response: Dear Mrsk4963,   I am happy to see that the front desk was able to provide you with great customer service. I would like to apologize that you were not please with the noise you were able to hear outside your room and from the room upstairs. The next time that you are in Costa Mesa I do suggest that you request a room that is upstairs so it would be a lot more quiet. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Wanted to make sure my gal Julie got to see THE best Christmas Light Boat Parade so embarked on a midweek adventure out to the coast and had a wonderful, friendly, efficient, and romantic stay at The BLVD Hotel not far from gorgeous sunsets, salty air, and overall sunny beautiful weather on Newport Pier, Beach, and, Balboa Island along with the festive Christmas Boat Parade. Definitely would recommend the BLVD again especially due to its closeness to the beach, area attractions like Disneyland and Knott’s,...but mostly it’s great staff!!  Thank You :0)
Manager Response: Dear Dbsjf2016,   I am so happy to hear that you had a romantic, wonderful stay with us and that you were able to show Julie the best Christmas Light Boat Parade located in Newport Beach. We look forward to seeing you the next time you stay in Costa Mesa so we can provide you with same great customer service.

Summary Heading: Definitely will not stay here again
Summary: Pros 1) close the water. 2) modern finishings in the room 3) free breakfast  Cons 1) really bad smell coming from the shower drain. 2) stayed in the back of the hotel and some of the homeowners kept staring at me when I opened my room door. 3) you can hear all the sounds in the adjacent rooms.  The couple next door had fun time for 1.5 hours and I could hear it all. 4) floor tiles were really loose outside the room bathroom
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great little modern place to stay!
Summary: Really cool place to stay near Newport Beach! The price to stay here is totally reasonable for this area, in fact its a great deal! It has been upgraded, it's super clean, and has a very modern atmosphere! Thank you to all the staff for being super friendly, especially Brittany! She's super cool and kind and she went above and beyond to help us with everything we needed! It's actually a 3 star hotel but feels like 4 stars! The bed is super comfortable and the sheets are super soft! Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Zaahira22,   I am so glad to hear that Brittany was able to provide you with excellent customer service, and that you were happy with our boutique hotel, cleanliness, rooms and hotel amenities. We hope to see you again on your next visit to Costa Mesa.

Summary: We arrived very late and the front desk check in was easy. for a completely nonsmoking hotel/ campus I found it odd to have a designated smoking area next to the pool, but it wasn't an issue. I'm not sure what chain hotel this was before, but the chic modern decor was a nice touch. The rainshower was a nice upgrade. I wouldn't recommend room 232 right above the front desk as at times it can be noises. Our room connected to another adjoining room and that person had their tv on loud most of the night and the light from under the door was a bit distracting. Oh my goodness the beds were such a delight. I seriously slept the best once I got to sleep! The beds were that comfortable. I'd come back for the comfort of the beds alone. While we didn't eat the continental breakfast as we
Manager Response: Dear Robertachristine,   I am so glad to see that you were pleased with all our updates since we finished remodels of summer 2017.  I do apologize that you were not happy with room 232 because you can hear the noise from the street and that it was an adjoining door. I do suggest the next time you stay with us that you request a room without an adjoining, upstairs towards the back of the property since it will be a lot quieter. I am glad to see that you were happy with our chic decor, beds, shower head and other hotel amenities. We hope to see you again the next time you are in Orange County.

Summary: Clean rooms, modern amenities... The staff is attentive and helpful. The whole compound has a modern clean aesthetic presence, you can exit off the 55 before the thick of it where it dumps into New Port Blvd... I only stayed one night but next time I would shoot for two  A.I.  Forever
Manager Response: Dear Todd,   I am glad that our location was a convenience for you and that you were happy with our front desk customer service. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your one night stay with us and we look forward to seeing you again in the future for multiple nights.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay at great price
Summary: Free glass of wine or beer, cute, clean place to stay with good bed, and a pool /whirlpool.  We enjoyed the two night stay.  The breakfast was just okay, but we keep our expectations in check for the price paid.
Manager Response: Dear JustaDinerTempe,   I am so glad you were pleased with our happy hour of two complimentary drinks at our Coast Lounge Bar in the lobby, that you were pleased with our rooms and other hotel amenities. We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel at an even greater price.
Summary: If your looking for great rates and a clean and comfortable hotel?... this is a great choice. This property has been renovated with a nice beach theme.  Location was good... right off the Costa Mesa Freeway with easy access and close to New port Beach and Huntington Beach.    We absolutely loved our stay.   Great Job Blvd!
Manager Response: Dear Trevor,   Thank you so much for your positive review. I am glad you were pleased with our price, rooms, location, and the recent renovations we made to the hotel. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: This hotel is an absolute gem. The rooms were very well done. It was obvious that the group spent the time and effort to update this property. It was very well thought out.  The rooms were very clean and the beds were extremely comfortable. The hotel was quiet, service was polite and efficient.  I would absolutely stay at this property or group of hotels again.  Well done.
Manager Response: Dear Carrie,   I am so happy to hear that you were pleased with all our recent renovations and that you had a wonderful stay with us. On behalf of the BLVD team we would like to thank you for your kind words and are happy to hear that you were pleased with our customer service, beds and other hotel amenities. We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights and our original room could not get a solid WiFi connection to save our lives. None of our devices could connect to heir WiFi; 3 iPhones, 2 laptops and an android tablet. Finally after an entire night and half a day, I asked if we could move to another room closer to a router. They happily moved us and the second room had no issues. All devices connected and we didn’t have issues. However, WiFi wouldn’t automatically stay connected. Every time you left and came back, you need to re-login with the WiFi login and password. I suggest the owners or managers to look into this.  As customers, it should be this difficult to connect to WiFi when staying. We should t even have to call the front desk, let alone call 3xs and walk up to speak to someone about it
Manager Response: Dear Stonegyrl,   I would like to apologize on behalf of the BLVD team that we failed to meet your expectations. Since your last stay with us we have a much better wifi service that we have not had issues with. Every time you leave our property you would still have to re-sign into the wifi to get access, but we do hope that you would consider staying with us again for us to prove to you of all our wonderful hotel amenities and customer service.

Summary: BLVD Hotel is a modest hotel within walking distance to the Pacific Amphitheater. The management was very accommodating and was able to upgrade my room (single King) to (2) Queen Beds without additional charge.  The room was spotless and decorated exactly like their photo's online.  It also had a small refrigerator, microwave and iron & board.  Although it was close to the freeway, it was very quiet and we got a good nights rest.  They serve a continental breakfast in a diner behind the main lobby.  Our stay was great and I would recommend this hotel to friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you N8956USdianah for your feedback. We are ecstatic to hear that you enjoyed your stay and our hotel amenities! We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: We had a very nice stay at BLVD. Check in was quick and efficient, and gave us all info for the happy hour, WiFi, and morning continental breakfast. The room was very nice- modern decor, with a microwave and fridge. As others have mentioned, happy hour included 2 drinks (wine or beer) per room. They offered pretzels for a snack with the drinks, however, the hostess used her bare hands to reach into the bag to fill our dish. ICK!!!  Breakfast included coffee and OJ, toast, bagels, mini donuts, oatmeal, yogurt. Enough to get you going. We were on the first floor, and could hear footsteps above. Not enough to keep us awake tho. Over all, a nice stay. Will return!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room had everything needed for a comfortable stay. Loved the 5-7 happy hour in the lobby. Two glasses of beer or wine came with the room during happy hour. The hotel had easy access from the airport and major roads. An overall pleasant experience.
Manager Response: Thank you Richard H. we're so happy you had a comfortable stay and were able to enjoy the happy hour from 5-7. We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: They are excellent! One negative point is the Internet, that is unstable.  The staff are nice.......The Brittany is very nice with guests....  The location is perfect.    I highly recommend this place for everyone.

As a female traveling alone, I am usually game to stay anywhere. However, there were 3 men loitering around outside when I checked in. Knowing that it was motel style with the doors opening directly outside, I had requested a 2nd story room so that my door wouldn't open directly into the parking lot. I was told there were none available (even though I never saw more than a dozen cars in the parking lot) and I was given a room on the back side of the hotel away from the parking lot facing a fence. I continued to see several different men and a female just wandering the property, which just seemed sketchy

Summary: To begin, the two young ladies at the front desk were friendly and attentive when checking us in.  The room was clean (as it should be), and it was pretty quiet (it was a Sunday night).  These points illustrate the only pleasantries of the visit.  The bed was a cheap king mattress.  It was very uncomfortable and left me with back issues this morning.  The frame that the box spring and mattress sit atop creaks and shifts with every movement made while sitting or laying on the bed.  My girlfriend and I laid down to sleep at 11pm.  At 12:30 I woke up with an itch from head to toe.  My girlfriend was awake, and complained to me of the same issue.  My sense of smell is not the best but she stated that the linens and pillow cases smelled of bleach or another abrasive cleaning agent.

Anyway it is nice in that respect after they remodeled an older style Motel 6 type structure.  You get a free happy hour drink each day in their quasi bar scene which doubles as the breakfast area.  Breakfast is very very limited.  The rooms were clean and service was good.  Now my experience.   I stayed 3 nights and the first night someone in the room above me was running back and force and sounded like dropping things on the floor till 4 am.  I complained the next morning and they said it was an international visitor and they did not have a reservation but paid daily.  So the next night was quiet as they

Summary: Aside from top tier hotels or rooms that start at $250 and up. This is definitely the best hotel I have stayed at. It is sooooo underpriced for the way it looks and feels. Recently renovated I believe, the décor is great, my friends were honestly impressed with the hotel during our beach trip and after looking at the price being surprised by the value they actually booked a room too! Then in the morning we drove the 5 minutes to the beach. You can spend MORE staying on the beach in old places with no views and smelly rooms or you can stay here in such a great place and then still be like 2 minutes from everything. There were others at this hotel that rid their bikes and skateboards from the hotel to the beach. As well we got free drinks with our stay and breakfast. The pool was
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for staying with us earlier this month. We are very pleased to hear your amazing and positive feedback. Summary: Decent size rooms very clean. Nice decor. The pool area was great and also clean. Definitely worth the price for a few day stay. Not too far away from stores and restaurants but you do need a car to get around there's not much around the hotel. All local beaches are 15 minutes away. Everything in the room worked great. Super cool shower fixture and sink. They have a complimentary happy hour at the  lounge/bar area with wine. I'm surprised at some of the reviews about the rooms and towel quality. I experienced and think the total opposite. My towels were clean and in good condition. No stains or funky smells. No room oder. The only bad thing was the wifi service, it worked briefly then kept shutting off and losing the connection way too often.... and also the tiny little flies,
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a renovated hotel that used to be a dated motel style building. The convenient thing is you can walk right into your room after parking without having to go through a lobby, but this brings a lot more traffic and noise when inside the room. The new pool and room furnishings, renovated bathrooms are nice, however the linens and towels are not of very high quality. For this price, with free wi-fi and parking, isn't so bad. You will need to drive or uber somewhere if you plan on dining out.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay for budget travelers
Summary: Pros: + Rooms are clean and tidy. + Excellent staff. They help you a lot. "Isaac" was very helpful for the whole time. + Nice little pool and hot tub. + Decent breakfast. + Large parking lot. + In decent neighborhood.  Cons: + A bit far from central L.A. + No gym. + A few broken items in the room. They fixed it when it was reported! + Breakfast area was a bit tight.

Summary Heading: Last minute booking left me pleasantly surprised
Summary: I booked here the night of and was pleasantly surprised by the high-end mattress/linens and chic renovation. Thin walls allowed the loud kid next door to be heard until he went to bed (thankfully early!) Then I had the best night sleep I've had in a long time. It is well appointed and the raindrop shower was fantastic.Wolfgang Puck coffee in the room was a nice morning treat. Breakfast is cheap,commercial motel fare along with more of the same for purchase after hours. That is the last detail that needs overhauling. Would stay again for the bed!

Don't be tuned off by the motor lodge exterior, rooms were done well and staff was great. Has a So-Cal contemporary slight surf vibe which fits the area certainly.  They even had a Happy Hour 5-7pm with free drinks..... who does that anymore? Typically stay in SPG or 4-5 star hotels. Had a 4 night stay and was pleased. For a professional business guy traveling it was good. No points but Good LOL!!

We needed early check-in a number of times and the staff accommodated us whenever they could.  When working in Newport Beach or the surrounding areas, we will definitely consider staying here again.  The parking lot is very small and you only get one spot per room.  If you are in a large truck or in a vehicle that is difficult to turn around, you will have a problem here.  There is only one entrance/exit at this facility.  There are a few good restaurants within a 2 minute walk.

Summary Heading: Good for its location and price

Otherwise, however, I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking for inexpensive stay in the Orange County area.

We will not be returning, which is unfortunate because it is a nice little place.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are very sorry to hear about your less than desirable experience while staying at our hotel. We would truly like the opportunity to gain you back as a loyal customer. If you ever do find yourself back in Costa Mesa. Please, connect with the manager directly to book your next reservation and we will be sure to remedy your concerns from your previous stay. Thank you very much for your feedback.

Summary: I must have been unfortunate to visit the place during remodeling. Apparently, I was in a room that had not been remodeled yet. Ugly hard beds. Smelly carpet (non-smoking, please!) Running water in the shower. Slow Internet. A half-inch gap under the door. High noise and vibration level. And this is not including the construction noise and vibration, just CA55 and other guests going to and fro their rooms!  Surely, there must be something good in such a gloomy place, and there was: very friendly and helpful stuff (kudos to them!) and happy hour between 5:60 and 7pm on certain days, if my memory isn't failing me. The local beer is excellent. Get your pint for free and enjoy your stay! (But read the first paragraph of this review first.)
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for your feedback and sharing your experience while at BLVD Hotel in Costa Mesa. We are currently in the process of remodeling our guest room bathrooms. We make every effort to provide all of our guests with the least amount of impact during these times. I am sorry to hear about the issues you encountered during your stay. On a happier note, we are glad you enjoyed the complimentary beer!

Summary Heading: Almost there - will be a great place
Summary: I think I may have arrived just a few weeks too early. They are finishing their renovations and it was a bit of a construction zone when I was there. The location was really handy. Front desk staff was great and efficient. Rooms are trendy, and the new design is great. Breakfast was a bit limited, but still included in the room rate. Of particular note was the great new bathrooms. Overall, a really good stay, and certainly will be a repeat guest when everything is completed.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for sharing your experience during your recent stay with us! We are just about wrapping up with for summer with our bathroom renovations. Be sure to take advantage of the complimentary Happy Hour during your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: Great front desk employees and very inviting new contemporary room decor.
Summary: An enjoyable first time stay. A very inviting and modernized lobby with an attractive bar area.The parking lot is finished and works very well. Parking is quite tight however and fortunately I had a small SUV. The bathrooms in the units are being remodeled when I stayed on April 4, 2016. Mine wasn't remodeled yet and much work would be needed to complement the upgrades in the rest of the unit. The unit would need overall painting and thorough wall cleaning in order to do justice to the upgrading. Walk in showers are apparently planned in some units. I would definitely stay here in the future based on the great upgrading efforts and location.  The front desk employees are definitely an asset to the overall operation.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very reasonable price. Basic amenities, front desk clerk told us there were renovations that began at 9, and we barely heard anything. The pool was a little dirty and the hot tub was very much room temp. But room was clean and very simple. Not bad for paying under $100 for a night.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience during your recent stay at BLVD Hotel. We apologize for the conditions of the our door pool area. We are glad to hear you enjoyed the room!

Summary: i may come back again front desk girls are very helpful  My kid forgot his I Pad in room and I called , front desk girl helped me and i was able to retrieve devise later on my way back home trough that area  Thanks
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for staying at BLVD Hotel during your recent visit. Any items left behind are turned into our lost and found and kept for 30 days before tossing. We were glad we were able to locate your sons I-pad.

Summary: We were in town for a concert in Costa Mesa over spring break and this was a good location and the price was right.  The room was clean and it was decorated cute.  However, the window to the room faced the walkway to every room.  Therefore, it was loud when people were walking to their rooms and we had to keep our blinds closed or you could see right into the room.  If you don't spend much time at your hotel when traveling or don't need amenities, (pool, spa, work out space), this is a good place.
Manager Response: Dear guest, thank you for choosing BLVD Hotel during your recent visit to Costa Mesa. We also really hope you enjoyed the concert. We appreciate you sharing feedback regarding your stay and we hope to see you again when you are in town for another concert!

Summary Heading: 15 mins close to everything for shopping, eating, activities, movies, health club
Summary: room and hotel itself is really nice, clean, etc.  if there are problems it's with other guests who don't seem to sleep, walking around loudly rolling chairs all night. kind'a dumb but that's it for me. hotel itself, the staff, all was nice for me.   IMPORTANT NOTE: this area is well known for well-to-do families (newport) with under aged children using local hotels for parties--this one included. so after staying both weekends & week days, week days are by far quieter.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience while staying at BLVD Hotel. All employees of our hotel make every effort to provide each guest with a great stay and our 24 hour front desk staff is here to attend to any guest issues. We appreciate your feedback and we thank you for choosing BLVD Hotel.

Summary Heading: Nice modern and very clean rooms
Summary: beside a freeway and a an airport - this is what you have to know - but all those motels are in Costa Mesa in a very simular or identic location. so I prefered the nice decorated and clean rooms, sleeping quality in the night was ok, bed was fantastic...
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for staying at BLVD Hotel during your recent visit to Costa Mesa. We are very pleased to hear you enjoyed the guest room bedding. We hope to see you again for your next visit in the area!

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for a couple of nights. The room was adequate and clean. Our first night, the employee working the front desk began the answer to every question with "unfortunately," and we soon learned why. The vending machine was broken. There was loud music playing in another room at 7 a.m., which because of the thin walls, disrupted our sleep. We had two cars and had to pay $15 per night to park the additional car. That was fine, but the second night the desk clerk told us that we couldn't park the second car in their lot, blamed the desk clerk from the night before for accommodating us, and was completely unhelpful when we asked to speak with the manager. The clerk was immediately defensive, not at all hospitable, and did not offer an alternative parking
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   I am very sorry to hear about the incidents that prevented you from enjoying your stay to the fullest. We thank you for sharing your feedback and we will be sure to correct these concerns with our staff to prevent similar future incidents again.

Summary: They have remodeled this place but everything they did was cosmetic.  It looks good but that is where the compliments stop.  First, the walls are VERY thin!  I could hear every little thing my neighbor did- when he sneezed, it sounded like he was in the same room as me! The bedding was insufficient as it was only two sheets an a small, thin blanket.  The shower had a weird leak and it sprayed out sideways. The coffee pot smelled terrible. The website said free breakfast but I saw nothing but coffee. Too bad, all the work they did was just to make it look good.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We regret to hear you did not enjoy your stay with us. Our hotel website unfortunately does not show that we provide breakfast at our facility. We will although be offering a complimentary continental breakfast in the near future. We also have staff on site 24 hours a day in order to assist with any needs of our guests. We would have been more than happy to provide you with a new coffee brewer and extra blankets. In the near future we will also be making additional modifications to our property to finalize our hotel renovations. We thank you for sharing your feedback.

Summary: This place is freshly remodeled, with fun, modern décor and nice fixtures.  The room I stayed in was a good size, very clean and the shower was lovely!  (Pretty tile, rain-style showerhead).  The non-carpeted floor made the room feel clean, but it does lose a bit of coziness because of this.  A fair trade-off in my opinion.  The walls seemed a bit thin, as I could hear the TV next door pretty well, but my earplugs took care of that!  For a budget hotel, this place is pretty darn nice!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff was great and the concept is cute but the pictures don't tell the whole story. The facade, lobby, and bedrooms have totally been updated but the bathrooms are older and a bit rundown. The shower is weak and, special note, no drawers or closets. The walls are also especially thin.   We personally are not amped to come back but it's a good option for someone looking for a cute place for the night... It's a decent bet.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for sharing your feedback. We would like to inform you that we are currently continuing to make more updates to our guest rooms, particularly in guest bathroom area. We are demolishing the old bathrooms and bringing a more contemporary look with our new stylish bathrooms which have plenty of drawer spaces for clothing  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your most recent visit. .

Summary: We did not know what to expect,but  it was pleasant. The room was a nice size and clean. I liked the non carpeted floors.  There was construction going on at the property, but it was not obtrusive. My complaint would be the poor quality of the pillows. The lights by the bed were not diffused by a cover and too bright for me. The staff was very helpful and cooperative. We ended up changing rooms because of problems staying connected to the Internet. We had downstairs rooms and the noise above sounded like elephants. Stay upstairs if possible.  The location is good and close to the beach activities. They are adding the facilities to provide breakfast and evening snacks and drinks. We would stay again as long as the price is right.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and found our staff to be helpful and accommodating. Please feel free to contact our hotel directly for the best deal and we will be sure to place a request for you to stay in the second floor on your next visit to BLVD Hotel in Costa Mesa. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We checked in Sunday - upstairs there was vomit everywhere leading into all the rooms. This wasn't cleaned up until Tuesday even after asking a couple times! It smelt so bad!  Value for money it's good but don't expect the best.  Heaps of people waiting in their cars over the 3 Night stay in the parking lot which was weird..
Manager Response: none

Summary: I wanted to be able give a five star rating initially but after awhile some issues showed.  But let me first say that our stay was great. The guy at the front desk was soooo kind and friendly.  When we saw our room we were pleased with how cool it was decorated.  The bed was comfy and I got a great sleep.     Now for the issues...remote was dead, hair dryer didn't work and fell off the wall and finally, there were MANY strands of hair in the tub when I got in (no way it had been cleaned with that much).  So although I wanted to love it, had to just rate as average.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Adorable retro hotel in convenient location.
Summary: Very surprised at the interior decor. Surf city color scheme. Loved the bare floors! We would definitely stay there again. Very close to convenience stores and Fabulous Italian restaurant on the corner within walking distance.  Staff friendly, lobby area nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were very impressed with the room. It was the first room ever that did not have carpet, it had linoleum flooring, we feel this is cleaner than carpet. The refrigerator and microwave were a nice addition.
Manager Response: Anna,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience while at BLVD Hotel. We are pleased to hear that you liked our guest room flooring! We thank you for choosing BLVD Hotel during your recent getaway.

Summary: This property has undergone a renovation but the quality of workmanship is lacking.  The level of the tile in the bathroom floor was above the laminate in the bedroom and there was a chunk of plaster missing from the edge of the wall in the sink area. Also, the cement walkways on the upper level were in need of some fresh paint. The door to the room had quite a gap, maybe about 1/8 inch and was enough so that it rattled during a very windy night.  That being said, the bed was comfortable, it was clean and amenities were there such as coffee maker, frig, microwave, iron, etc.  The front desk staff were friendly and we appreciated that we did not have to pay for parking.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We always appreciate hearing from our guests. The hotel has been working very hard to complete renovations to provide all our guests with a more pleasant experience while at our facility. We hope to complete our guest room bathroom and exterior renovations very soon. Thank you for choosing BLVD Hotel for your recent stay in Costa Mesa.

Summary Heading: Somewhat "renovated" but lacking in looks, amenities, and hospitality
Summary: My wife and I stayed here for two nights while we were working in Irvine. While the location may be close to fairgrounds and attractions the hotel itself is lacking. The pictures though accurate only tell part of the story as most of the remodel seems to be shoddy workmanship (walls not completely painted, molding that does not line up, dirty baseboards, really old bathroom tiling that's falling off, and cobwebs). It is a motel, not a hotel so this seems like highly false advertising. It was nice to have a small fridge and microwave and both worked just fine. The heater worked easily and perfectly and the pictures on the wall are a bit fun. The television though a fine size we had numerous problems with the remote working correctly and the power button sometimes turned the tv on
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We appreciate hearing your feedback. We are working very hard to complete our entire renovation process as quickly as possible so that we can provide all of our guests with the most comfortable experience possible.

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at the BLVD Hotel. The location was excellent being that it is so close to the OC Fairgrounds. This was our second stay, and we will definitely stay here again and recommend it to family and friends as well.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your second stay with us! Next time be sure to ask to stay in one of our fully renovated guest rooms with the new bathrooms. Please be sure to tune in to any offers or promotions we may have for future discounted room nights. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: the room was ok but the bathroom was gross. it was old and the walls were so dirty and stained. never stay unless you bring Clorox wipes and Lysol. the pictures are accurate of the room but they need to renovate the bathrooms. I think its really a motel but they called it a hotel
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience while at BLVD Hotel. We understand your concern regarding the guest bathrooms and I would like to inform you that the hotel is in fact currently in the process of renovating the current bathrooms. A few of our guest rooms already include the newly renovated guest bathrooms.

Summary Heading: 10 Days in Costa Mesa - Orange County
Summary: Such a good place to stay , very new furnished and reffurbished . Staff very helpful and friendly. Near a good supermarket  I had booked a bike and visit the beaches using it . I do recomend this hotel ;
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for sharing your experience! We always appreciate to hear from guests who stay with us. We make every effort to accommodate every single one of our guests. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: If you can bare through the construction it's a gorgeous place to stay! Cheap prices even comfier beds! We stayed 2 nights and would've booked for more if we were going to stay in that area but we ended up venturing to different cities! I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to stay for a week!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience with others! We always appreciate hearing from our guests. We are very pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and would have loved for you to have stayed longer! Please know that we make every effort for our guest bathroom renovations to have minimal interference with our guests. We hope to see you again!

Summary: We wanted a secluded getaway and this place worked. It was quiet despite being bear the fwy.  They're also going through a renovation but we weren't bothered by it. The room was clean and comfortable. As they're renovating there are things still needing improvements but didn't ruin our stay. Bed and pillows were comfy. The shower head wasn't adjustable and the tub didn't hold water. Stayed in room 126. Staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience while staying at BLVD Hotel during your recent stay in Costa Mesa. We hope you return to visit us once again and are able to stay in one of our fully renovated guest rooms with our new bathroom design!

Summary Heading: Great stay at this cute hotel
Summary: We just got back from staying at the BLVD hotel. The location is perfect for pretty much any orange county attraction. We went to the beach and knott's berry farm. The room was clean and super trendy. Surfer/ beach motif. The bed was very comfy. The staff was friendly and helpful. Although i didn't use the pool, it looked beautifully clea n and had cute little cabanas. For the price this not to miss.
Manager Response: Dear guest,   BLVD Hotel is very glad to hear you enjoyed your recent stay with us! We have recently furnished our guest rooms with new mattresses so we are glad to see you enjoyed the comfort of the new beds. We would also like to inform you that we also offer transportation to Disneyland which we hope you can enjoy on your next visit to BLVD Hotel.

Summary: It pains me to even give this one star as the hotel is absolutely abysmal!! Nothing was as in the pictures, the bed area was redone but the bathroom was old, dirty and broken! You could only flush the toilet by opening the tank lid and manually pulling the chain, the bath drain was completely missing, the floor was sharp and uneven. Oh and did we mention outside our room there was a row of broken toilets and countertops ripped from other rooms!? Now for the best part: from 10 pm until 6 am we had a rowdy stampede going on that despite numerous calls to the front desk wouldn't stop and we NEVER went to sleep. So we go to check out at 6 am (2 days early) because it was the worst experience we have ever had. The front desk responds that we can't get a refund because it was less
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Location! Great Hotel! Great Room!
Summary: Costa Mesa is a nice town... centrally located from San Diego and Malibu, Huttington,  Newport and Laguna beaches. We saw it all because we were close enough to home. This hotel is probably one of the best you could pick - for the price and the awesome rooms. The fridge and microwave were thoughtful. The storage space all over the room was ample. The room interior didn't make you feel like you are in a cell - the decor is awesome! It is quiet. Extra privacy because of the wall right in front of your door. Nice italian, thai, japanese, etc restaurants and other services in the vicinity. And everyone was nice... front desk and room service. Thanks guys!!!
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience at BLVD Hotel. We always love to hear that our guests have enjoyed their stay. There are many little gems in Costa Mesa and we are  just a short drive from any of them! Please be sure to take any of our restaurant suggestions located within the directory books found in each guest room.

Summary Heading: Great location, good place to stay.
Summary: My boyfriend and I absolutely loved our stay in the Costa Mesa area. There are tons of places for shopping, dining, sight seeing, all of which is close to this hotel. For the price, it was totally worth it. The rooms are pretty modern and clean. We loved its proximity to Newport, Laguna, amazing malls and the like! Would definitely stay here again. Noise was not an issue for us, except for the terribly loud AC unit (sounded like an airplane)... We didn't bother saying anything because my boyfriend brought ear plugs (we read previous reviews and were forewarned). However, we did not hear our neighbours at all...we stayed on the second floor. Another aspect that I didn't care for was the lighting in our room, it was truly quite dark, which isn't the biggest deal. Definitely
Manager Response: Dear guest,   BLVD Hotel appreciate all feedback from our guests, only then can we learn ways to improve all aspects of our hotel services. We will be sure to consider improving the lighting of the guest rooms. We are very glad to see that you found our hotel to be conveniently located between the many beautiful and one-of-a-kind attractions. We hope to see you and your boyfriend again in the near future!

Summary: This was a LAST minute reservation with no help but the other reviews on Trip Advisor.  We were very pleasantly surprised with how clean, neat, quiet and affordable this place was.  Not luxury, but who goes to California to stay in the room???
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Southern California has some very unique attractions from beautiful clean beaches to top class shopping and dinning and BLVD Hotel is in the center of it all! We are very glad to hear that your last minute trip to Costa Mesa was a success. Please be sure to visit our website for great promotions throughout the year.

Summary: Always first rate service and caring from front desk ladies.  Clean rooms and pool and spa always clean.  Housekeeping done well and concerned with getting more towels and toiletries. Some nights the hotel could be called the "boom,boom" hotel as couples can be noisy in their rooms.
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience at BLVD Hotel. Every one of our staff members prides themselves in providing stellar customer service and being of assistance to all of our guests. We hope to you see return back to our hotel in the near future!

Summary: Location - handy Mattress - sagging No breakfast - disappointing Housekeeping - very good Pool area - very convenient The hotel was well located for our needs; we missed having a close source for breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you very much for your feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience of not having breakfast available during your stay. Our staff would have been more than happy to recommend you some nearby and delicious breakfast cafes.

Summary Heading: Adequate for a short a stay
Summary: Got this hotel through Hotels.com  Whenever I get hotels through a .com site I am always worried until I actually see the room. In this case, the staff were very friendly but there wasn't any breakfast facility and the rooms were old and in need of refurbishing but they were clean. This hotel is convenient to many places of interest and a lot cheaper than chain or boutique hotels. I do not think that I would stay in the future though.
Manager Response: Dear guest,   We appreciate your feedback. I would like to share with you that the hotel is currently in the process of making improvements to the guest rooms. We also apologize for not having the complimentary breakfast available to you during your stay. Our website displays a notice regarding both of these matters. Thank you very much for sharing your concerns.

Summary Heading: DON'T DO IT. HORRIBLE, HORRIBLE, HORRIBLE.
Summary: AWFUL. I wish zero stars was an option. Disgusting rooms with leaking air conditioners and moldy bathrooms. BUGS in my room. WiFi does NOT work at all, cannot accomplish a thing using it. No elevator and an abysmal location right next to the freeway. This is an old, crappy motel that they attempted to cover up with cheap mass-produced furnishings... many parts look unfinished and like they were put together by a child.   HORRIBLY RUDE employees, especially one named Raphael. Someone actually entered my hotel room while I was gone, (not the maid service, nothing was cleaned/bed not made) my belongings were rifled though and rearranged. This Raphael person left a very rude voicemail on my phone. I felt so threatened and violated that I left this place and rented another hotel for
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff and new owner are all extremely accommodating. Very easy check in and wonderfully comfortable rooms as well as a beautiful pool. The new owner has done a phenomenal of making this hotel a very classy business hotel as well as great place to return for a Newport get away....We will definitely return!!! (it's also extremely wheelchair friendly)...
Manager Response: Dear guest,   We appreciate your feedback regarding our renovations and improvements that have been made to our property. We hope to see you again in the near future. We cannot wait to impress you even further!

Summary: My experience was good, the room looked exactly like the pictures. Check in was easy, and employees were nice. The hotel was close to the OC fair, which was nice because it was the reason for our stay. I stayed in plenty hotels in my lifetime, and I would say this hotel was a great value for the price.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We appreciate your feedback from your recent stay with us this past summer. Not only are we conveniently located near the OC Fair Grounds, but also very close to Newport Beach and South Coast Plaza. We hope to see you next year for the 2016 OC Fair!

Summary: It was a nice room, my daughter had stayed here previously while visiting from San Francisco.  The only thing that was disappointing was that online it said that the hotel would provide a simple complimentary breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We apologize for any confusion you may have encountered regarding the complementary breakfast that was currently not offered during your stay. Due to lobby renovations, the complementary breakfast was removed and we are working very hard  to ensure it returns very soon. Thank you very much for sharing your concern with us.

Summary: The Blvd Hotel is a renovated older motel but was comfortable, clean and has a great location with easy access to the major freeways and the beach.  The decor is urban chic with wood floors and excellent blackout curtains.  The beds were firm, not worn out.  The towels a bit scratchy, but the sheets comfortable. No extra amenities except for coffee in the lobby and a pool and jacuzzi which we didn't use - chose the short drive to the Newport peninsula for our swims.  We stayed 5 nights.  This is very near the OC Fair grounds, Vanguard University, lots of shopping and great eating.  I needed to receive and send a fax while staying and the staff was quite helpful, sent it for no charge.  Overall, an excellent value and I would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience! We have a very helpful staff that takes fulfillment in providing assistance to other guests. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and would consider BLVD for a future stay in Costa Mesa.

Summary: Nicely updated hotel - good customer service - clean and reasonably priced.  One minor quibble ... would like to have more/larger trash cans in room - two gallon-sized trash cans is not quite adequate.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for sharing your feedback! We always appreciate hearing from our guests.

Summary: So, it appears that the owners have renovated a prior Comfort Inn roadside motel into BLVD, ostensibly a boutique-like property with cool wall art of surfers ad beach scenes on the walls of your room.  There is also no carpet ... perhaps not ideal for families with toddlers, but quite appealing for the rest of us. The flooring is some sort of fake wood product, but looks and feels good all the same.  Lots in the "plus" column:  1)$119/night rate (AAA) in the middle of summer season; 2) nice pool & jacuzzi area with a "cabana" 3) modern decor & vibe; 3) mini-fridge and microwave; 4) complimentary wifi (very fast) and parking.  A few negatives:  1) thin walls/ceilings ... there was either a herd of elephants above me on the second floor, or maybe it was the construction; 2) not
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   BLVD Hotel thanks you very much for sharing your experience regarding your most recent stay with us! We always seek feedback from our guests so that we can improve all aspects of our services. We are glad to hear that you liked the décor of the hotel. We do regret to hear about the noise level you encountered during your stay. We will be sure to keep that in mind during the next phases of our hotel modifications. Also, we have staff on site 24 hours of the day that is more than happy to share the many attraction areas that Costa Mesa and its surrounding cities have.

Summary Heading: Great little place, clean, affordable and close to the beach!
Summary: First stay here and will return. Stayed 6 nights. Vacation with the family and enjoyed our visit! Conveniently located near the beach, freeway, grocery store, laundry mat and short travel to the Parks. Area seemed safe, no homeless or street people around. The living portion has been recently remodeled and is very good condition, although the bathroom area has not been updated but was decent. Comfy beds. No carpet anywhere which is a plus for cleaning up sand from the beach. Our room was on the lower level, parking lot side - plus for us with access to the car. Pool area was clean, pool and spa was warm!  Downside - no breakfast offered, smoking area located next to the pool, trash in the landscaping. No roll away bed available - but we brought a cot and mat just in case. For
Manager Response: Dear guest,   We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us in July. Thank you very much for sharing your experience while staying with us. We make every efforts to best accommodate each and every one of our guests. We would also like to share with you that we will be making modifications to our guest bathrooms to complete our guest room improvements.

Summary: The hotel was nice.  It was relatively clean.  They advertise free breakfast as an amenity but, due to renovations, it was not available and apparently hasn't been for a while.  The front desk staff was great and very helpful.  Comfortable, nice room. The walls are shockingly thin.  We could hear people talking in their room above us, beside us, and outside.  The AC unit is also quite loud.  I would probably come again in the future.  It would depend on the price at the time of booking.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience while at BLVD Hotel! We always appreciate feed back from our guests. In the past we did actually offer complementary breakfast, but it is currently not being offered due to kitchen area renovations. We anticipate offering our continental breakfast very soon. Also, we love returning guests! Feel free to visit our website as we are constantly running promotions or give us a call directly and mention you have stayed with us in the past. See you soon!

Summary Heading: This Hotel is a good option to stay at for the Beach
Summary: I read the reviews and everything is fine with this hotel. Nice renovations, no construction except by front desk but not a disturbance. The rooms are nice exactly like the photos online and was very comfortable for my family of four. Also no carpets on the floors made for a cleaner room. It is in a good area where you have a lot of options to drive for restaurants and not far from Newport or Huntington beaches. Consider staying here instead of paying the high prices with the beach motels. This is clean and worth it. The only issues I had was with Wifi the one morning and the drain in the shower was a little slow draining. But they can reset the wifi from the front desk. Cool little pool area too! One suggestion tighten up the rubber or chalking  around hotel room doors so there
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  BLVD Hotel is so happy to hear you enjoyed your most recent stay! Our hotel staff makes every effort to accommodate each and every guest that stays with us. We always appreciate hearing how much guests enjoyed their stay with us and learning how we can improve our facility and services. By the way, families with multiple rooms really do prefer those connecting rooms!

Summary: The rooms were recently done and were perfectly clean. The pool area was well maintained as well. We loved our stay here, and would most definitely book again. It was a short drive to the beach, but that was no problem - it was worth the short drive! Breakfast room was also nice and neat and the food was delightful. It was a fantastic price for incredible value. Thank-you for a wonderful stay, we'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear guest,   BLVD Hotel is very please to hear you enjoyed your stay with us last year. Many more improvements have been done to the property since your last stay. We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Don't fall for the fancy photos
