Summary: We stayed here for one night in order to catch the early morning boat to Catalina Island.  Fortunately we only stayed one night.  The rooms were recently remodeled, but however I guess their budget ran out when it came time to remodel the bathrooms.  The bathroom was pretty much unchanged and still looked tired and worn out.  The rooms was nicely decorated and the bed was actually comfortable but that's about it.  The curtains were stained, the ac unit loud and doors and walls thin.  The kitchen part of the lobby was still being worked on albeit very slowly I guess.  There was no breakfast because of it and I guess they haven't offered it for quite some time and have no idea if they will in the future.  It's too bad as I was actually looking forward to this place but turned out
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you for sharing your experience while at BLVD Hotel. Although we wish we could do a complete remodel of our property much faster, plans for the restroom space in all the rooms and kitchen plans are still in works and are pending approval with the city.

Summary Heading: Excellent place, until the wi-fi quit working in the AM
Summary: i had written (and submitted) a glowing review, but unfortunately the wi-fi stopped working in the morning so i am retracting my glowing review and revising it downward.   yes the rooms are nice, yes the pool is wonderful.   but when three devices that worked fine the night before on the hotel wifi stops working in the morning (android, laptop, and phone), and all three devices continue to work on my broadband mi-fi, maybe its time for the morning hotel staff to believe me when i try to get them to reset the wi-fi !  if the electricity quit working, the hotel would take that seriously.  if the water stopped, the hotel would take that seriously.   so why not take the wifi seriously too?
Manager Response: Dear guest,   We apologize for the Wifi issues you encountered during your recent stay with us. We do take all guest concerns very seriously and we have corrected all Wifi issues on the property since your last visit to BLVD Hotel. Thank you very much for sharing your experience!

Summary: This is a 70's era motel that has been upgraded. New furnishings, floors, decor etc. quite nice. Good location close to John Wayne airport and freeways.  Small pool, continental breakfast, easy & free parking.
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you very much for choosing BLVD Hotel! As you may have noticed we are also conveniently located near other attractions such as the OC Fair, Newport beach and South Coast Plaza. We hope to you see again soon!

Summary: This motel is going through renovations and is clearly a work in progress.  From the reception area to my motel room, the fit and finish was just not there.  My room was also a bit noisy as I could hear the conversation of the occupants staying next door.  Having said all of that, the reception people were very nice, the room itself was clean and adequately appointed and the mattress and pillows were to my liking.  The price was also right.  Overall, it was a pleasant enough stay.
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you for sharing your experience while at BLVD Hotel. We are making every effort to minimize disturbance to our guests while lobby renovations are taking place. We hope to meet your standards with the arrival of our BLVD bar, improved complimentary breakfast, in-room restrooms renovations and the completion of the property renovations.

Summary Heading: Newly remodeled, but they forgot the sound insulation
Summary: We stayes for 2 nights here while visiting Newport Beach. The room had a nice new surfer vibe - but I felt is lacked some simple things - there were no drawers for storage, and although totally redecorated - they should have insulated the walls between units first. you could hear conversations from the rooms on each side of us and you could hear which TV shows they were watching. It is decorated nicely - the beds were extremely comfortable - they are very close to Newport Beach - pool area was nice - but the sound knd of wrecked it for us - we spoke to the neighbors also on both siedes and they had the same complaints. I dont think I would recommend this place.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We apreciate you sharing feedbak on your most recent stay with us. Once we completely remodel the restroom area of the rooms, we will be sure to add storage space for clothing. We will also take into consideration noise issues from our rooms, especially those with adjoining doors.

Summary: The BLVD Hotel is a refurbished and rebranded Comfort Inn, about a 5 minute drive to the beach in Costa Mesa. There are a few restaurants in close walking distance. The rooms and beds are quite comfortable with minimalist but very functional furniture. The floors are hard surface with no rugs or carpet. The hotel advertises free breakfast, but it was not available during my stay during to remodeling, which should have been disclosed. Close examination of some of the finish work betrays the age of the property, but it otherwise has an overall ultramodern interior appearance. This is definitely not destination lodging, but it is a notch above the budget category. So it is suitable for business travel [good free wifi] or vacation travel that focuses on the area, not the lodging.
Manager Response: Mr. William,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience regarding your most recent stay at BLVD Hotel in Costa Mesa. Since the rebranding of the property, we quickly began doing major renovations to the exterior, interior and lobby of the hotel. As you may have noticed, we have not completed our renovations to the property. With the arrival of our bar and updated breakfast lineup we hope to be able to meet your lodging standards.

Summary: I very much enjoyed my stay here on a business trip.  Well appointed in a modern, hip style.  My room was spacious and quiet, with fridge, microwave, coffee maker, comfortable king bed and furniture.  Obviously an updated motel, now a treasure.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for sharing your experience! The design of our rooms and spacious work space and ergonomic chairs are catered for those business travelers like yourself. We hope to see you again on your next visit to Costa Mesa.

Summary: We stayed for about a whole week and enjoyed our stay retty much! The room was big enough and always clean. The bathroom has a tub and the sink is seperated from it so there is no trouble in the morning who can go first. The pool area is big and good euquiped with chairs etc. If I'm back in this area I will stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Michael,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience while at BLVD Hotel. We hope to have provided you with good accomodations during your week stay. Our outdoor pool area is a vey pupular ameniy for our guests especially during the warm summer months. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: A Great Little Gem in Costa Mesa
Summary: This hotel is a gem! Located very near the OC Fairgrounds, it is convenient to the event venue and to the nightlife of Costa Mesa and Newport Beach. The rooms are very modern, very comfortable, and very nice, and the staff was very friendly and accommodating. I highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at BLVD Hotel. We are truly glad to be so close  to the OC Fairgrounds. We look forward to your next visit to Costa Mesa!

Summary: Stayed here on a family vacation with the kids to Disney.  Hotel was VERY clean.  Parking lot was clean.  Had a loud neighbor on my last night there, but that is my only complaint.  Currently the lobby is being remodeled so they were not offering breakfast, but that was not a deal breaker for me.  Everything was modern.  Beds were super comfortable and the shower had good water pressure and had HOT water.  The only thing is that with all the remodeling and updating they did, they kept the old beige shower curtain which I that was a bit odd.  But that is neither here nor there on the stay.  Had cabanas in the pool area and a hot tub.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience with us. We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. Once again, we apologize for not having offered our complimentary breakfast for our guests  while on your stay. We hope to be reopening this area very soon. We are currently still in the process of doing renovations to our hotel. If a few months we will actually be completely remodeling the bathrooms in all of the rooms. to finalize our room renovations.

Summary: The hotel has a lot if great upgrades and touches. The rooms are very modern and shic. The only thing I didn't prefer was the hard mattress, not so great on my back. But I suppose that all comes down to preferrance. Also, they have these small half sized square pillows. Make you wonder if they couldn't afford to pay for a regular sized pillow. They were very plush soft pillows, but they were small. Other than that, it's a great hotel for a great price in a great part of town.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and we thank you for sharing your feedback. We are very excited for what we have coming with our renovations. We also always strive to accommodate our guests to the best of our abilities. Next time you stay with us, please do not hesitate to ask for a softer bed mattress and all large size pillows.

Summary Heading: I don't quiet understand why people complain
Summary: Yeah it's not a Hotel but it's a very good upgraded Motel. Dark hardwood floors with nicely selected furnitures and wallpaper - everything feels very comfortable. The office chair was extra comfortable especially since I had to code throughout the night. There are outlets on the wall right at the desk, so you don't have to unplug any lamp, etc and the room is equipped with a Microwave and Mini fridge. The bathroom was pretty large and fully stocked with all your morning needs with enough towels.  The internet speed was decent with 5 Mbps down and 1 Mbps up. Streaming music was very solid. Airport is only 10min away.   I booked this hotel 1h before arrival and the staff was super friendly - there were no upsells or any weird "charges". Only took about 5min to check-in.   Well the
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank yo u very much for sharing your feedback about your recent stay with us. I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay. We apologize for the inconvenience that the temporary closure of the breakfast may have caused to you. We are working very fast to complete our lobby renovation and we hope to be able to offer the breakfast very soon for your next stay with us!

Summary: We stayed at the BLVD Hotel in mid-December, for two nights. The first night was horrible. The walls were paper thin. There was a fellow staying beside us and we could hear *everything*, as if he was in the room with us (and without going into detail, what we heard was disgusting). We are now able to laugh it off but had we had children with us, I would have made a formal complaint. The second night we didn't hear anything, thankfully, and we were actually able to get some sleep.  The staff were very friendly and helped a few times with directions. A selection of cereals, yogurt, and muffins were provided for breakfast. It was a $20 cab ride from the hotel to Newport Beach. Otherwise, there wasn't too much going on around the hotel.  Due to the noise level and location, we would
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are so sorry to hear about your unpleasant first night with us. It is certainly an issue we can look into resolving in the future. We have a 24 hour front desk staff available to assist with any issues. We encourage our guests to notify us of any issues right away so that we can accommodate our guests right away.

Summary: I was not referred to this hotel by anyone, I just found it on some random travel site.  My boyfriend and I stayed there one night, in town the Supercross race in Anaheim.  We were both very pleased with our stay.  The room was very nice. I love how they remodeled.  The reason for the 4 of 5 instead of 5 of 5 is only because the property was still going through some renovations so visually on the outside it was not complete but renovating doesnt happen overnight so it didnt bother me.  All in all we were both very happy with our visit and will definitely be staying there again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We hope you enjoyed the Supercross race in Anaheim!  We also thank you very much for sharing your experience with us. We are working to complete our hotel improvement phase as soon as possible.  We look forward to your visit again!

Summary: The room was spacious, clean, and modern, and the bed was comfortable with lots of pillows. While some might complain that there's no carpet, it's better for those with allergies, and it's easier to clean. Hotel staff very friendly. Exterior areas show signs of wear, but the rooms are updated and very nice. While the lobby is being renovated, there's no breakfast offered.  We ate at a restaurant that isn't on their list--Eat Chow. Very good!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We are still in the process of improving our property form the interior and exterior. The restaurant listing provided inside our hotel room directories was composed directly by the restaurants our staff members have been to, but we are always open to adding new restaurant recommendations to our room directory!

Summary: I stayed in the BLVD on the recommendation from a friend when I was attending his Christmas party in Newport Beach and his comment was that they'd stayed there a couple of night when their house was having work done and the 'hallways were under construction but that was 8-9 months ago'.  When I arrived, I remembered I'd stayed there before under a different name and it was under construction then.  Well, it's under construction still!  The lobby area is demolished, the front desk is in a room and the free continental breakfast is in another room.    Though the front desk made me sign my life away that I could not smoke in the room, my first room could at least say there was no one smoking in there now.  They apologized and gave me another room.  It was decent, nicely remodeled
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We appreciate you sharing your experience. Since the rebranding of this property, we have been doing major renovations to our hotel. In order to provide minimal disturbance for our guests, we have strategically planned out each phase of our renovations by seasons. Unfortunately, a project of this size does take time. We do although hope to finish as soon as possible for the convenience of all our guests. We thank you for your patience and we hope that you stay with us again once all our renovations are done.

Summary: The one and only positive: nice job on the website!  Other than that, this hotel should be avoided at all costs. Including free! The lobby was undone and small. The rooms was done and small. And dated; even though they had recently remodeled (can you say, "lipstick on a pig?"). The pool was never used, which was probably best since it looked as though it had never been cleaned.   Even the smoking area was unkept and unclean. Which you would expect from a smoking area, but even so!  If you don't eat breakfast, then you won't mind the breakfast bar. If you do eat breakfast and only like bad coffee, packaged donuts and instant oatmeal, then you'll be happy.  All in all: never again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are very sorry to hear about your unpleasant stay. We always like to hear feedback from our previous guests and take any suggestions on how to improve our facility. We are still doing renovations to our property. We hope to be able to provide an unforgettable experience for all our guests.

Summary Heading: Overall, great for the price and location
Summary: Overall the is a decent hotel. very close to Newport Beach and John Wayne airport. The neighborhood it was in was decent and I did feel safe being there alone most of the time. The few issues I had were minor. There was a surprisingly large spider in the room but I called the front desk and the women there was happy to send the maintenance man to come kill it for me! The construction that was happening durning my stay was a little annoying just because I like to sleep in. They would start around 9 am and be done by 12 or 1 usually. And lastly, the phone, a lamp and the TV weren't really working. But like I said, all minor things in my opinion. The staff was very nice and super professional. Really pleased with the room, especially for the price. I will here stay again :)
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay overall. I do apologize for the noise from our lobby renovations.A room closer to the pool area should make the lobby renovations noise less of a problem.   We ensure to have all the minor issues resolved for you for your next stay. We look forward to having you stay at Blvd Hotel again in the future!

Summary: friendly staff, good location, close to Newport Beach, close to South Coast Plaza and modern hotel. One thing they need to work on it is to add a wardrobe in the room and make the breakfast menu more versatile.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your feedback. We are very glad to have a property that is so close to those local attractions you mentioned. Once our lobby is remodeled, we will certainly consider expanding our complimentary breakfast selection. All rooms will also have more wardrobe space once the bathrooms are remodeled as well.

Summary: New(er) motel in xlnt location.... Near everything ...quiet rooms with comfortable beds at good prices.  The pool and spa were nice features.  Ample parking.  Breakfast was on time and the coffee was good.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience from you recent stay with us. We always appreciate those who provide us with feedback. We hope you return to visit your friends at Blvd Hotel in the near future!

Summary: The hotel in it of it self was very nice, the experience was good. It was a little noisy and there were a few maintenance issues. However, the staff was great and the location was convenient. it was an experience
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience at Blvd Hotel. We aim to please all our guests and provide an accommodating atmosphere. We definitely will ensure we correct any maintenance issues to provide a more enjoyable stay.

Summary: Not a bad place to stay on a budget.   Rooms are clean and have mini fridge in them. Breakfast is free.  Walking distance to food, dry cleaners, laundry and a circle k. No left turns out of the parking lot so that's a bit of a hassle but the bonus is it's near Costa Mesa mall and not far from the beach. All around solid place to stay for not a lot of money.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We thank you for sharing your experience while staying with us at Blvd Hotel. We always enjoy hearing from our guests and learning ways on how to improve our services. We are very glad you enjoyed your stay and we hope to you return very soon to see your friends at Blvd Hotel!

Summary: Rooms and decor were modern and tasteful. Bed and pillows were comfortable. Noise from Newport Boulevard was at times fierce but was generally quiet during sleeping hours. Good selection of HD channels on the flat screen tv.  Refrigerator and microwave included. Free breakfast included hard boiled eggs, waffles, Danish, yogurt, and juices. One of the cleanest hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We appreciate your feedback from your last visit at Blvd Hotel. Blvd Hotel strives to create the best possible experience for all our guests. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Amazing place lots of upgrades very modern and for a great price, I got in pretty late and the evening staff was extremely welcoming and when I needed to stay an extra day they were more then happy to accommodate me ! Breakfast is limited but still complimentary which is nice !
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for choosing Blvd Hotel while on your stay in Costa Mesa. Our helpful staff is always here to assist with accommodations 24 hours. Once we complete our lobby renovations, we hope to be able to add more to our complimentary continental breakfast selection.

Summary: Located close to beach, gorgeous styling in room, comfortable, modern design, and can't beat the price. Definitely will return and will recommend to our friends and family. This is our second stay at a BLVD Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for returning to Blvd Hotel! We truly appreciate loyal guests. We hope that next time you return to Blvd Hotel you will find a brand new remodeled hotel lobby!

Summary: Everything was good, they could have better lighting at the pool at night... Staff was friendly and the breakfast was very good... The room was nice and cozy, and the hotel was quiet, no vagrants or hookers hanging around .. I'd go there again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Blvd Hotel always loves hearing from the guests who stay here. We will definitely keep your comment in mind as we complete our pool area. Your friends at Blvd Hotel hope to see you soon!

Summary: My husband and I stay in Costa Mesa often and this was our first time at the blvd. When we arrived the staff was so friendly and I especially loved the ice cold orange water they offered us because it was sooo hot outside. The room was very clean and everything was newly done. They also have a great complementary breakfast. The pool are is georgous. Not your ordinary pool side. Thisis a non smoking hotel so the only thing I would have liked is a nicer area to smoke outside for us smokers. We will definitely come back and we recommended the blvd highly.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Blvd Hotel thanks you very much for sharing your wonderful experience! We are very pleased to hear the you enjoyed your stay, our ice cold orange infused water in the lobby, and our pool area. We look forward to you and your husband returning to Blvd Hotel on your next visit to Costa Mesa.

Summary: I stayed here in July with my family because the price was competitive. The hotel has gone through major renovations from what appeared to be a dumpy motel to a now boutique motel. It is a typical motel setup with all the rooms accessible from the outside. The beds were not comfortable and there was a considerable lack of space to put your clothes (no dresser). The free breakfast in the morning was a step above continental, but was adequate.   The biggest complaint I had regarding the "hotel" was the clientele when we were there was more representative of a motel. There were a couple nights where we couldn't sleep because people were having parties at all hours of the night. One night in particular there was an argument outside our room that was loud, people cussing at each
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   The Blvd Hotel appreciates you sharing your experience with us! We are very sorry to hear about your less than desirable stay at our hotel. Whether it is with us or not, we encourage you to continue to notify any hotel agents about any continuing issues during your stay to ensure they resolved. Safety is very important and we are sorry to hear that we could not provide you with an environment where you felt safe. We will ensure to correct this for any future stays at The Blvd hotel.

Summary: Very cute. Fun remodel of a former Motel.  100% No-Smoking except for area by pool, so pool smells like cigs. So maybe 95% no smoking. AC is a window unit and takes a while to cool down. Really close to all the nite life.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   The Blvd Hotel appreciates your feedback. In the future we may consider relocating the designated smoking section so that those enjoying our pool facility can be and feel more comfortable.

Summary: My only critique, and it's pretty minor, is that the breakfast room was so hot you were barely able to stay in there long enough to finish your breakfast. The selection of the free breakfast was fantastic, but the temperature in the room prevented anybody from being able to enjoy it
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for your review. Once we compete the lobby renovations this year, we can assure you that the breakfast room will be a much more comfortable place to enjoy your complementary continental breakfast each morning. We look forward to your return at The Blvd Hotel.

Summary Heading: A great find in Newport Bch/Costa Mesa area
Summary: This remodeled property was pleasant, clean and comfortable.  It was a last minute booking and rate was equal to some of the bigger name hotels which were farther inland. Yes, not a Hilton, Hyatt or Marriott, but a perfect fit for my 3 day trips as our house was under a remodel. I was at the tail end of summer vacation so there were a few family groups in the hotel and no rowdy 20 or 30 y/o's out partying.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   All of us here at The Blvd Hotel are very happy and pleased to hear that you enjoyed your three day stay with us. We always love when happy guests return to stay with us! Congratulations on the remodels of your home and we cant wait  for you to return and stay with us for your next getaway.

Summary Heading: Stayed here twice, won't be a third time
Summary: I was looking forward to the remodeled property for our second stay here, but was disappointed. It's just a cheap motel. The staff was very friendly. That was the most positive thing about our stay. The doors between the connecting rooms are terrible at muting noise. We had to ask to change rooms, which the girl at the desk happily did. She mentioned it was an issue they were trying to deal with. The breakfast room was way undersized and therefore a mess. The idea of removing the carpet from the rooms and using a laminate type flooring seems like it would be cleaner, but it wasn't.  The spa was cloudy during our 3 day stay, but the pool was clean.  There were also big spider egg sacks all over the bottoms of the chairs and lounges around the pool. I asked the front desk of they
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are very sorry to hear that your stay with us was not as pleasant as we all would have liked. We do although appreciate you coming back and staying with us a second time and for sharing your experience. We always want to find ways to improve our facility and services. We will certainly look into these issues.

Summary Heading: A last minute booking, I was pleasantly surprised.
Summary: I decided last minute to extend my vacation and hit the beach and stayed at the BLVD for 2 nights.  It is very much a re-branded motel but the staff was top notch and the room was very clean and comfortable.  They seemed to go to great lengths to eliminate the Motel feel and they did pretty good.  The floor was "hardwood", not carpet which was great, and the bedding was upscale and soft.  The bathroom was nice with a large tub and a good shower head.    The only thing i noticed was the ancient A/C units, but it worked fine.  An upgrade to digitally controlled units would be my suggestion.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   The Blvd Hotel appreciates your feedback. Good customer service is always #1 for all our staff. We believe that it is an essential part of the Blvd experience. We truly are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: I stayed at this motel twice in two weeks so I feel I have a handle on this place.  First, it is way overpriced.  It should be in the $80 range but they try to get more than $130 for a night, DON'T do it!  The location is a 10 to 15 min drive to the beach but certainly not an area for a family to walk around.  It's next to the freeway, a tattoo parlor, late night massage and other low end motels.  The first time I stayed I was hopeful and it was dark when we checked in.  The room was nice enough and the kids actually ate the continental breakfast (I couldn't touch it)!  The second time I told my husband (he wasn't on the prior trip) it was fine for a night so we tried again.  I tried calling to reserve the $86 rate I had seen but no one answered the phone, several times in one
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are very sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay at The Blvd Hotel. Unfortunately during the summer there are many events in the area that drive rates to increase in many hotels/ motels. We often run discount promotions that we love for guests to take advantage of. Booking in advance also guarantees that guests low rates for guests.

Summary Heading: Absolutely terrible. Rip-off, this is a motel not a "hotel." Do not stay here. The good reviews must be fake.
Summary: Unfortunately this "hotel" is nothing like the pictures online. You think you'll be staying at a nice hotel, it looks sleek and modern in pictures, but in reality it is a Motel 6 with purely aesthetic upgrades. The mattress is still awful, the tiles in the bathroom were still thrown on by an idiot (if you stay here you'd know what I mean), the sink and shower do not drain (wish I could attach my photo of the brown water in the sink backing up after the water was turned on for only a few seconds), the water itself was disgusting -- the taste was so strong and so bad that just brushing my teeth with it was awful, and it was so strong that it overpowered the tea that I tried to make with it as well, breakfast was inedible (yogurt expired, hardboiled eggs had gone bad, breakfast
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are very sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay with us here at The Blvd Hotel. Our goal is to always try our absolute best to make every persons stay pleasant. We are also sorry to hear that you did not enjoy the free breakfast. After your yogurt report we immediately did a breakfast room inspection to ensure all the products were okay. Our hotel guests rarely have wi-fi connectivity issues. Sometimes the solution is as simply as restarting your device. Lastly, our property has been undergoing major renovations, but we have not reached our finished product. We will completely be gutting out the bathroom areas in every single room. WE hope that you can give us another opportunity once we have fully completed renovatio our property.

Summary: Beds were comfortable.  Check-in was easy.  Room was clean.  Toilet was LOUD.  Breakfast could have been much better - pretty plain for a 'boutique' motel.. I think rate I pd was doubled due to OC Fair in operation.  Would definitely stay again, but not at the price I paid.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Summer is a great time to stay at The Blvd Hotel in Orange County, but the OC Fair along with other local summer events do drive drives. We would really love for you to come back once summer is over!

Summary Heading: Remodeled older hotel, substandard, not fully upgraded. Not worth price.
Summary: We have stayed in this area before and saw this place was remodeled to BLVD Boutique Hotel and would give it a try. Hotel is an older ( days inn, choice hotel ) type place. They added some wood and glass to the front side, smoothed out stucco, paint but that is where it ended on outside. Back side rooms outside not done same and not painted all the way. Inside front sleeping area has new flooring, linoleum wood looking, fancy wood headboard, desk area which is nice. Bed is firm but poor, noisy springs. Bedding had some stains and marks on sheets. That is where it stopped. Bathroom area appeared not to have been touched. Room wall had patchs done and not painted. Around some areas they just stopped painting. Electrical out for a/c was missing cover and drapes hanging over outlet
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for sharing your feedback with us. We always love hearing from our guests on how we can improve our services. We are very proud of our renovations thus far, but we are not quite finished. We are excited to share with you that we will be completely redesigning our lobby area and our bathroom areas in all of the rooms in the near future. We thank you for staying with us, and we hope that you return to The Blvd Hotel once all renovations are complete.

Summary: The hotel was in a great location, the staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was clean and updated. My only complaint was there wasn't any coffee left when we went to the breakfast room ! I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at The Blvd Hotel. Next time please let us know that the coffee is out and we will quickly brew up some more coffee for you! In fact, coffee is available for guests 24 hours. We look forward to you staying with us again in the future.

Summary: Hotel is close to fair, a room in back was quiet,  loved the decor, updated rooms have a cool feeling,  everything was clean and the pool was enjoyable. Breakfast could use innovation and shade would be good at pool.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for giving feedback on your stay. We absolutely will look into providing different breakfast options in the future once we renovate our breakfast room area. The Blvd is expecting new pool furniture very soon so that our guests can have an even better time relaxing while indulging in the SoCal sunshine!

Summary Heading: It was very comfortable, convenient to the beach and it was clean.
Summary: We found this to be a perfect location for getting to the beach, shopping and eating. The young man behind the desk was extremely helpful in helping us find our way around the area. The room was a nice size and the shower was the best one I have found on a hotel for quite some time.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are indeed conveniently located near some great dinning selections. Our staff takes great pride in always being as helpful as possible with each guest when offering dinning or attraction options in the area. We hope you pay us a visit again next time you are in town!

Summary Heading: Terrible , horrible run for your life . Absolutely unconscionable .
Summary: This was the most horrible place I've ever stayed . Filthy and full of feat kids partying all night . The management put all their guests in an unsafe situation and will not respond to requests to resolve the matter . We had kids banging on our door at 3am . Drunken parties . The room had dirty stained sheets . The ironing board had scorch marks all over it . There were hairs all over the bathtub and sinks . They took our towels and didn't give us any for the second day . I called the front desk about 7 times the first night and they did nothing . I wrote a letter to management with my concerns and they would not even respond . This is a horrible mismanaged hotel with no accountability .
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is newly remodeled and very clean. The location is a few miles from Newport Beach. They promvided a good breakfast although very small breakfast room. The rooms are very accommodating and fair size. We had our 7 month old baby with us and had plenty of room for his play pen and toys. Overall this was a great hotel with very affordable price.
Manager Response: Dear Mrs. Majors,   Thank you very much for giving us feedback on your stay earlier this month. It is true that we have recently remodeled our property but we are not entirely finished. We know the breakfast room is a bit snug, which is why we will be expanding the area as part of our lobby renovations once we pick up renovations later this year. Also, we are glad to hear that your family fit comfortably in the room. We look forward to your return to The Blvd next time you are in town!

Summary: First impression.... The pool and hot tub are closed until further notice for painting... In July!   Don't stay here this week!   Asked for discount. None was offered, the manager did not appear.  Nothing else to report at this stage... Oh,they take $100 security deposit.
Manager Response: none

Summary: With an AM trip to Catalina Isalnd, this location afforded me an extra 2 hours of sleep versus driving home from a day spent nearby. The decor was nice but the old hotel converted feel could be noticed especially in the bathroom/ closet area. Nonetheless,  I would return and spend more time here since the location is central, I felt safe, the staff was accomodating, the free breakfast was hearty and the pool looked inviting.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We hope you enjoyed you Catalina Island trip! We are excited to share with you that once the summer months come to an end, we will be completely remodeling the bathrooms inside all the rooms so that they can fit the theme of the rooms. We will also be completely remodeling the entire lobby area as well.

Summary: The BLVD is close to the beach and is doing well during construction which is only going to make the place nicer. Staff was extremely helpful even when the phone in our room would not stop ringing (not their fault and an easy fix...just took it off the hook) Easy access off Newport Blvd. and centrally located if your'e going inland for a Dodger game or down the coast to Laguna. Price is awesomer than anything!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Congratulations to you and your spouse! We are also very pleased to see you shared your stay at The Blvd Hotel. We are absolutely lucky to have such a great convenient location. We also thank you for understanding the phone issue the hotel was encountering during your stay. We are glad to say the issue has been resolved and we apologize if the phone woke you at night. We hope to see you and your loved one at The Blvd in the future!

Summary Heading: Nice stay; even while remodel is in progress
Summary: First; the "continental breakfast includes egg and sausage for those who are looking for actual protein.    Missing from room; décor continuity but they are remodeling, there is no place to hang clothes or hangers, and adequate light for us ladies to apply make up:)    Bed, comfortable but squeaky, pillows and all other bedding good.  Plenty of parking and the pool and Jacuzzi seem to be in good shape.  Wifi is good so no worries there.  A bit noisy but I think the room above me was a prep area for the remodel and you can hear outside the room but not from room to room.  Overall I would stay again but I do not really like big hotels and this is small and quaint.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your previous stay at The Blvd Hotel! Thank you very much for our feedback. We always love to hear tips on how to improve our hotel. Not enough lighting cannot be good when applying make up, I do agree with you on that! As soon as summer comes to an end we will be doing major renovations to our entire lobby area which includes our breakfast room area as well. We will definitely change up the décor once we renovate to align it with our rooms.

Summary: Wow totally loved the rooms they are very contemporary and clean! Our stay was perfect! Will totally be staying there again!! The staff were very friendly and professional! Loved that they were completely  smoke free!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience. Although we understand that smoking is very common for people in our society, we like to keep our hotel smoke free out of respect for those individuals or families who are not smokers. And if you liked our rooms now, we are excited to share with you what's in store for later. We will be completely remodeling our entire lobby area once we come to an end with the summer months. We want to make sure to bring that contemporary feel to the entire property! We hope to see you again so that we can show off our finished product.

Summary: It's good value for money.  Excellent location, very good facilities and the staff very helpful and nice. The rooms are big enough and clean.  Very good shower.  Extended hours for pool and spa.  Everything works well.
Manager Response: Dear Former Guest,   We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us last month at The Blvd Hotel. We always love to hear how each stay was. We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Modern style room, comfortable and clean
Summary: Great room we had a good stay at the hotel we had a one bedroom with king size bed, flat screen TV, nice bathroom. location of hotel is right off the 55 freeway what's nice figure to be in Newport. modern style room, free breakfast in the morning. Nice and clean. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for sharing your experience at The Blvd Hotel! We are glad that our guests enjoy the complementary breakfast. We are also very lucky to have such a convenient location only minutes away from some amazing beaches. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: The BLVD Hotel was awesome. Clean, quiet, wonderful breakfast and friendly staff!  I would stay there again.  Absolutely!  Looking forward to returning in June 2014.  There prices are very very reasonable and for the area I must say so much cheaper than any of the other hotels.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay at The Blvd Hotel! We do agree that those back rooms are pretty quiet, especially on the 2nf floor. We are glad to hear you think our prices are reasonable, but just as a heads up, summer is a very busy time for this area and you should expect to see a slight increase in prices especially during the OC Fair time. If those prices are a bit high, you can always look for any promotions we may be offering! Thank you very much for your feedback.

Summary: This was my first time at the BLVD, I found that the room was comfortable and specious. It had the amenities offered. The staff was friendly and available. The breakfast buffet was ample and satisfactory. i will be definitely be using the BLVD on future trip.  The only suggestion I have is that an electric plug should be available in the area to be used for computer work. A Lamp with an electric plug would solve the problem, as all the sockets are behind the wood piece of furniture. Also placing a chair with a back in that area would be more comfortable than the current stool.
Manager Response: Dear guest,   Thank you very much for staying at our Costa Mesa location! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We always love to hear suggestions from our guests. We are in the process of installing electric outlets by the desk areas. We are actually almost done installing them in all of the rooms. We have also started placing new desk chairs in the rooms for a more comfortable work space.   We look forward to your visit again in the future!

Summary: Being from the area and having stayed at a number of hotels and motels and resorts in the area, I was pleasantly surprised to see the exterior of the property greatly upgraded and assumed that the interiors would match.  While not a total disappointment, the layout of the bathrooms leave much to be desired and the grounds are not entirely clean.  The mattresses, I doubt, have been upgraded from the previous tenant and are passable at best.  The upside:  newer tv's, nice floors in the room.  I would put it slightly better than a Motel 6 or Super 8 but below the Best Western down the street and well below Courtyard by Marriott and those types of lodgings.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your feedback! As you very well noticed from your recent stay, the hotel is going under renovations. There is still work to be done to both the exterior and the interior. The bathroom area will be completely reconstructed in the near future, the hotel lobby and the pool area. We hope that once our renovations are complete you can visit us again and give us another opportunity to impress you!

Summary: On my initial approach to the hotel, I saw the tattoo parlor next door and my heart started to sink.  I know that Newport Beach/Costa Mesa are good areas - just did not want to be in the one section that isn't.  No worries! A perfectly safe neighborhood with minimal freeway noise.  This is exactly what it is...a place to put your head at night and get a good nights rest.  They are doing renovations to the hotel and the hardwood floors are a big plus.  Very clean and hotel staff are EXCELLENT! The first night I was in a room that had a connecting (avoid these rooms as the sound barrier between rooms is very thin) door and could hear the people next door which was very unpleasant.  The night hotel staff tried to find another option for me, only the hotel was booked and rooms were
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for the feedback. We always love hearing what our guests think about our newly renovated rooms. Although your first night's sleep was not the best, we are very glad we were able to remedy the problem the next morning. Our staff takes great pride in being helpful and finding accommodations for our guests when ever possible. We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to your visit once again!

Summary Heading: Always enjoy staying at The Blvd Hotel when in Cal. on business
Summary: This hotel used to be a Comfort Inn, I am very happy that it is now independent, the owners are making significant improvements to the property.  Our business requires travel to Southern California on a frequent basis and our sales staff always stays here when we are in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We truly value your business and thank you for choosing The Blvd Hotel as your preferred hotel during your business stays. Our free wifi is a big plus for guests who are here for work. Our small printing and fax facility is great also. We know that traveling for work is not always easy, but we try to make it as enjoyable for business travelers as possible! We look forward to your visit!

Summary: This was an excellent experience.  I keep coming back to this hotel, because of the  friendly, accommodating staff, the well-maintained facility which has a welcoming, comfortable atmosphere and the good value for money.  On this stay, I was solo, but I've been here with family members who also appreciate this inn.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for choosing The Blvd Hotel for your stay again. Our team at The Blvd takes great pride in providing the best customer service in the area. The team does all they can to make each and every guest feels right at home while with us. We hope to see you and your family on your next visit to the area!

Summary: We had a great quick stay at the BLVD.  It was clean and updated with a fridge, microwave, coffee maker and hair dryer. The stay was very comfortable and easy with 2 children.  The kids enjoyed the pool in February which helped ease any complaining.  I would recommend the BLVD.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are very excited to hear about your pleasant stay! Our rooms are only going to get even better once we finish renovating them. We absolutely agree that the pool is definitely a bonus when traveling with children. It sure keeps them entertained. We hope you visit us again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Spend that extra money on an actual hotel
Summary: Apparently they call this a "hotel" but in reality, it is just an upgraded motel. The whole building itself is dark brown. We arrived late at night and it just looked unappealing and uninviting. They lack light in the hallways so it was super dark and dangerous.   Upon entering our room, nothing is more inviting than a spider on a wall. But that's ok, it's just a spider. The room looks like the pictures, except instead of hardwood floor, it was carpet. Carpet with some stains here and there. There was a stench also, but it's normal for a hotel.   Of course, everyone would like to shower before they go to bed. Unfortunately, we were unable to take a nice shower because of the extremely slow drain. It was like taking a shower in a bath, it was disgusting. Called the front desk,
Manager Response: Dear Former Guest,   We regret to hear about your unpleasant stay. The property is currently undergoing renovations. We are adding more lighting to the entire exterior to provide a more clear path through our walk ways at night. We are also working on completely remodeling our rooms. We are getting rid off all the current furniture and pulling out the carpets. We are replacing the carpet with hard floors and installing custom made furniture.   We can only hope you give us a second chance once our property is fully renovated.

Summary: Clean, affordable, average breakfast, but found there was a shortage of items - when things ran out at breakfast it was a few days before they appeared again, so the choices got smaller as the days passed, and the same happened with the shampoos, etc. in the rooms. The fridge had a high frequency motor.....not loud but enough to drive one crazy so we solved that problem by unplugging it whenever we were in the room. Other wise we felt safe and slept well which is the most important thing for us in a motel.
Manager Response: Dear Former Guest,   We apologize for the selection in breakfast items. Next time, please be sure to let any of the Blvd staff know if you need more room amenities as we have plenty in our housekeeping room.  Extras are provided upon guest request. We absolutely know that the refrigerators can be a bit noisy, and that is exactly why we have ordered all new appliances for every room that will be installed during our room renovations!   We hope you visit us again in the near future.

Summary: We just stayed a night on our way to Disneyland. We were pleasantly surprised at what we found. You can tell the property is old, but they've done a good job at updating the rooms.  This was a clean and affordable (under $100/night) place to stay in So Cal. Disneyland is just 15 minutes away and you can also head down to the coast.   The breakfast is no good. But, for me, if the rooms are clean and the people are friendly, it's worth the stay. We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are really happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay while at The Blvd Hotel while on your trip to Disney. As you may have noticed, we are renovating our hotel. We hope that you are even more pleased when you stay with us again on your next trip to So Cal. It is always very exciting to be able to show our returning guests our process with the renovations!

Summary: I thought this was a good place to stay just to spend the night. The room was clean, and the breakfast was average. The only thing I really did not like was that they collected a $100 deposit from me right when I checked in, even though I paid for the room in advance on Groupon. They told me that it was standard protocol for all hotels, but that's @#$% because I've never had a hotel do that to me. They did refund the deposit when I checked out like they had promised me, so they do hold their word on that.
Manager Response: Dear Former Guest,  We are glad to see that were able to take advantage of such a great promo, good for you! Most hotels do require a security deposit for incidentals. As we promised, that deposit for incidentals is released at the time of checkout provided that there are no damages to the room. It is our hotel policy.   We hope that if you enjoyed your stay at The Blvd Hotel, you contact us once again next time you are in town!

Summary Heading: A Very Nice Place to Stay
Summary: I stayed for several days over the weekend in mid January and loved it.  The decor is modern and comfortable with an upscale flair that I really appreciated.  Free internet is always a bonus, and I was very appreciative to find that the jacuzzi was clean, hot, bubbly and relaxing.  If you are attending an event at the O.C. Fairgrounds, this hotel is ideally situated and great value for the money.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Our team at The Blvd Hotel appreciates the feedback of our former guests. We know that our free wifi is always great bonus. We are really happy you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to your visit again when you are back in the area!

Summary: Stayed here for a week.  The staff is super accommodating and friendly.  Easy access to freeway. They are updating the hotel so there is work being done, but it didn't affect my stay. Front desk staff is very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We always value feedback from our former guests.   Our front desk staff is trained to provide friendly customer service to all our guests. We want to ensure that every person is comfortable while staying with us, especially if they are here for a week!   We pride ourselves is doing all that we can for our guests to ensure as comfortable a stay as possible.

Summary: check in was super easy and fast but also very friendly, the rooms were exceptional good for the price we paid. They had some kind of construction, or paint jobs ongoing therefore the outside may be not in the best shape, but the room was super clean and beside the location right next to the freeway I heard not much and had a nice sleep.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We appreciate your feedback during your recent stay. The exterior renovations are just about all done. The property looks nicer and nicer each day.   We hope that you visit us again next time you are back in town.

Summary: We stayed here only one night after traveling from San Francisco and to attend a meeting the next day. We didn't expect anything big but I was positive surprised by the room size and cleanliness!  This hotel is all we needed. We didn't tried the breakfast because we intended to eat in a nearby cafe.  WiFi was free and fast.  The area is not very quite due to located next to the freeway. However they didn't bother me much and I was able to sleep well.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Next time you are back in the area for another meeting ask for a room away from the street side so as to avoid the freeway noise. We would be happy to accommodate you!!!

Summary Heading: A great little place to stay
Summary: The BLVD Hotel is great! It was undergoing outside painting whilst I was there, which in no way affected my stay. The staff were all lovely and helpful. I was impressed with the quickness of service getting me into my room, as I had a ridiculously early arrival, and they were happy to accomodate me, when all I wanted to do was have a shower and lay down after a 15 hour flight. My room was comfortable and clean, had everything I needed really. I didn't have a vehicle to get around with but the local taxi company were awesome, and helpful in suggesting places I might wish to visit, and all trips I did seemed to be in the $5 to $10 range. Good deal! I would definitely stay here again on a future trip, can't wait to see the "finished product" when all the renovations are done.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Blvd Team, we would like to thank you for staying with us in October. We try our very best to accommodate your every need in the best possible way we can. We are very glad to hear that our staff was helpful during your stay!   We hope that you return to visit us next time you are in the area!!!

Summary: The BLVD hotel was awesome. Don't judge a book by its cover...they were painting and renovating the outside of the hotel, so it was not "so pretty" when we drove up but the front desk was very friendly, helpful and knowledgeable of their surrounding areas. We came to know that this hotel was formerly the Comfort Inn and is located about 10 minutes from John Wayne Airport. Our room was a good size and very clean. Our beds were very comfortable with clean carpets and bathroom, drapes and bedding like new and walls freshly painted. Furniture, doors and trim were a dark brown stain with a modern look. There was a little frig, coffee maker, microwave, iron/board, flat screen tv and hairdryer in the room. This hotel also has a complimentary breakfast each morning with your usual
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Your friends over at The Blvd Hotel are absolutely thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay! We always try our very best to make each and every person that walks in through our lobby feel that we are always here to help in any possible way we can. We want to make sure that everyone is happy while staying with us.   If you think the rooms are nice now, we cannot wait to show off our new remodeled rooms once our renovations are completed. We will still continue to offer those great amenities you enjoyed from your most recent visit like complementary parking, wifi, breakfast and of course that friendly staff.   We hope to see you again at The Blvd Hotel!

Summary Heading: Well located for the price but scruffy (was being renovated)
Summary: The hotel was undergoing renovation when we stayed but it was pretty scruffy at this time. The reception area and staff were excellent. The breakfast room and vending machine area was like a building site with wires trailing and water leaking. The breakfast selection was excellent one of the best in the LA motels we stayed at. The worst aspect of our stay was being woken up in the middle of the night with the wall vibrating by guests next door doing what couples do in motels in the middle of the night. Maybe thicker walls would help.
Manager Response: Dear Former Guest,   We would like to thank you for staying with us! But we would definitely also like to extend our apologies to you for any inconveniences that you may have encountered during your stay during our renovations.   Our goal is to finish our renovation process as soon as possible so that we can provide all our current and future guests with an outstanding getaway experience in a modern and chic environment.   We hope you return to visit your friends at The Blvd Hotel once our hotel is renovated!

Summary Heading: Not what we expected after speaking to the hotel. Motel 6 with slightly better bedding!
Summary: Considering what we paid to stay over a long weekend last month... there should have been more. Motel 6-sized rooms and this property hasn't been renovated in years. Pool and hot tub were fine, and the breakfast was OK for just coffee and a pastry. Crowded parking lot and it was this fact that created all the noise we had to contend with during the night hours the three days we were there. Check-in was fine but the clerk didn't make you feel welcome.   Located off a freeway that heads toward the beach, which is still a good 5 or 6 miles away, makes getting here sort of tough. Can't really walk to much down their frontage road except a Subway and a Circle K.  Kind of a downer spot in the end. Will not be coming back.
Manager Response: I apologize for your unpleasant stay at the Blvd Hotel. Great customer service is something we always encourage from all of us at the Blvd.   We are also vey excited and thrilled to say that we will be starting our renovation process very soon. We do agree that our property is outdated and that is exactly why we want to add a different feel to this hotel.   I hope that once our renovations are complete, you will give our hotel another chance!

Summary: We were able to check in early without any problems. They provided a list of restaurants that were near by which was a great help. The one my fiance and I choose was Sushi Sho which was amazing. The room is step up very nice and updated though the walls are thin. The a/c works very well had to turn it down a couple of times since it got cold.
Manager Response: We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Blvd Hotel. Our goal is to provide al our guests with the best customer service we can by building a more intimate bond. We always love to provide guests with recommendations on what kind of things to do and what places to dine at during their stay.    We hope you've enjoyed your summer and we hope you visit us again in the future!

Summary Heading: We were expecting a Comfort Inn... but ended up with this mediocre motel instead
Summary: My brother had stayed here last summer and thought it just OK. Now the owners have left Choice Hotels and have become an independent establishment. That might be fine, except in this case. Turns out my brother was in out party earlier this month and was struck by just how far the property has sunk. Only thing that has been changed is the tops of the bedding from when it was a Comfort Inn. The rate has been boosted another $30 / night.  Main problem with this place is the staff. Front desk clerks come across as uncaring and not a bit concerned about the guest. The housekeeping crew has to be the worst. Grumpy, have zero clue what you're asking them, and they let the sad little breakfast dwindle down to nothing daily. Just an all around uncomfortable experience. Not the best area
Manager Response: On behalf of the Blvd team, we apologize that you feel that way about our Hotel. We have made minor changes to our property, but new beddings are not all that we are doing to our property. We are very excited to say that we will be starting our renovations very soon and we hope that this will bring a different feel into the hotel.   We also encourage all guests to ensure that their vehicles are properly locked. Unfortunately if you leave your windows open, it may place your vehicle in greater danger. We will also do our part and make sure that the registered vehicles are more carefully monitored.

Summary Heading: Trifecta of The Bad.. Old worn property in questionable neighborhood, indifferent service by the staff, and overpriced!
Summary: Had stayed here a few times when it was a Comfort Inn. Hotel needed to be upgraded three years ago. Soiled and dirty carpeting, walls, and lots of mold in the bathroom. Dark furniture. Mattress had two hollow depressions from former guests. Linens were just passable. Hardly any sun gets into the room. Motel also features no elevator, which they don't mention when making a reservation.  Clerk at front desk told us everything was new and had been replaced when we spoke to him on the phone. It had not. We stayed here last year for two nights. Same old same. Decided  to give it a try though last month under it's new name "Boulevard". It should be called "Frontage Road". Scary little location with creepy people walking about. Housekeepers are not friendly in the least and speak no
Manager Response: On behalf of the Blvd Hotel team we apologize that you did not enjoy your stay. We also apologize for any miscommunication that there may have been as far as the rooms are concerned. We have not included all new furniture just yet.   We do understand that while changing the property name is not enough reason to charge higher prices, we are very pleased to say that we will be starting a renovation process. We hope this will   change the feel of the hotel.

Summary Heading: Ancient former budget motel old as Babylon, with safety concerns
Summary: Crusty worn yellowed structure with all entrance doors facing the outside atmosphere. Rooms were super small. Like spending the night on an AMTRAK sleeper car. Not the cleanest inside with numerous stains on the carpeting. Shower area had mold and the bath didn't drain well in the least. Flat screen was decent, and that's about it for this place. Mattress was collapsing and the pillows were lumpy. Biggest issue at this hotel is the noise. People traveling up and down the corridors at all hours of the night. Not good and the front desk could have cared less.  Breakfast room was just sad. Again about the size of an AMTRAK dining car, with about 70% less space. No official "breakfast person" to restock. One of the housekeepers zooms in and bulldozers her way through the crowd
Manager Response: Guest Former Guest,  We are very sad to hear about your less than desirable stay back in May. Since your last stay, things have changed. We went from being the Comfort Inn to a private brand known as the Blvd Hotel.  We absolutely agree that this property needed some drastic remodeling changes. This is exactly why we are extremely excited to say that we will be starting our renovation process for this property very soon.   We hope that after the renovations are complete, you give this property another chance!

Summary: We came to Orange County for a little family trip. Found this Hotel on yelp, called and got a really great price!  We stayed for 2 nights. Free WiFi, Breakfast, and Parking! Awesome Breakfast: Fresh Waffles you make yourself--Scored a lot of points with the kids...The breakfast room was a little small but Hey, it was free!!! you can't beat that and they have the nicest Housekeepers working in the breakfast room, super friendly and sweet.  Staff was very helpful and friendly. Great Location, close to everything: beach, freeway, a bunch of shopping centers and Malls. Overall it was a Great stay. We will come back for sure!!!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  On behalf of the Blvd staff team, we thank you for choosing our hotel for your stay. We also greatly appreciate your feedback on our housekeeping and front desk staff. Each and every member of the Blvd team tries to do all they can to ensure that all guest needs are satisfied. We aim to provide stellar customer service always!   We hope you return on another family trip soon!

Summary: Good location of few miles away from key sites, valuable room fee, nice compact pool and jaggzy, and quite clean room. However, very noisy all the time: car engine noise from HW55 and its sideways, crazy guys next door talking loudly after midnight, and always vibing and shaking refregiater, etc... I won't stay there again, otherwise I will reserve a room far from highway and no connecting.
Manager Response: Dear Former Guest,  We are very sorry to hear about the noisy stay. We do completely understand that guests want a nice quite room to relax in, but unfortunately being right across from the 55 freeway can make that hard at times.   We hope that you chose to stay with us again, and a trick to ensuring a nice quiet stay is to call us directly. By making your reservation right over the phone you can always place a request for a room on the quiet end of the property. This will ensure a more enjoyable stay.

Summary Heading: Poor management, property in need of updating, rude housekeeping staff
Summary: Found this hotel online and as it was fairly close to the beach made a reservation. Room rate was OK. Looks like it used to be some budget place with it's outside door entrances and rather small structure. The rooms themselves are so small that you bump your knees walking about the room. Size is maybe 10 x 10 with chipped dark wood furniture. Also, they have NO elevator which is not good. Dirt and dust in the corners of the room too.   We asked for some additional towels one morning from a housekeeper and she just glanced at us and went about her business. Then we spoke to the head housekeeper who acted as if she could care less about our simple request. Very strange and shows you the lack of training these girls receive from the owner / manager. Passed this information on to a
Manager Response: Dear Former Guest,  We are very sorry to hear about your unpleasant stay.  We also apologize for the lack of good customer service you received from the staff. We would like to inform you that since our last stay we have gone through a management change. In addition, we have also changed the name of the property. We understand that the property was very outdated so we have decided to spunk up the hotel. We will begin our renovation process very soon.   We hope that you give us another opportunity to impress you once our property has been renovated.

Summary: Stayed here for the annual Pacific Coast Sportfishing festival t the O.C. fairgrounds. Room is nice, clean and spacious. It also has a refrigerator and a microwave oven, nice work desk and a flat screen TV. The breakfast had a good selection and the dining area was kept very clean. Room was quiet from street noise. No view, stayed on the side street side opposite from the parking side, the staff at the front desk was very pleasant and helpful. I will be back. Free WiFi and free parking.
Manager Response: We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed for last visit. If you liked our hotel then, you will love our hotel after our upcoming renovations! We recently changed our hotel name to the Blvd Hotel, but the great thing is that we have still kept all the same great perks: complementary breakfast, Wi-Fi and parking.   We hope to see you next time you are back in town!   -Blvd Team

Summary: Just returned from a one-night stay in Orange County. Just needed a place to crash for a reasonable price. This place was perfect. I asked for a quiet room, and was given a quiet room, upstairs, not on the parking lot side, not next to the ice machine, not above the pool, not on the corner. OK, so the view wasn't much, but I didn't need that.   The room had a microwave and a fridge, basic bathroom, ironing board, etc. The lamps were plentiful and the lightbulbs actually gave off light! King bed was fine and plenty of pillows.   Comfortable reading chair with an ottoman and a decent lamp. Best of all, free wifi. I didn't use the TV at all, but it was a flat screen.   Shower water was plentiful, however the water draining was quite slow, and I ended up standing in a couple of
Manager Response: We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. We absolutely agree that free Wifi is very important for our guests especially in todays world. That is why we are very happy to offer this at no additional cost to our guests. We are also very excited to inform you that we will be starting our renovation process under our new name. We will still be offering some of the same complementary things we did from your last visit. We hope to see you again in the future! - Blvd Hotel Team

Summary: I was visiting for the Namm show , which is one of the biggest conventions the Anaheim convention center holds for the music business and most hotels and travel suppliers know that they can raise prices for this special 5 day event. The people I represent booked a 4 star hotel for me for 2 days and I had to book my own hotel for the first days myself and picked the Comfort Inn and it was the BEST decision I ever made.  Upon arriving ( after a canceled flight) a 13 hour travel day that is normally 1 1/2 hours from Salt Lake to Los Angeles  I arrived at the Comfort Inn.  I was greeted with a clean and well thought out hotel... and by one of the nicest, most professional people I have ever met in the hotel industry.  Sanjay was so upbeat, so welcoming, so courteous, I felt really
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review! We greatly appreciate your recognition of our evening desk clerk and posted a copy of your kudos for the entire staff. Additionally, thank you for your repeatbusiness. We are very happy you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: We booked a room here on New Year's Eve.  The rooms were quite comfortable, it had its on refrigerator, coffee pot, good size bathroom and pleasant cusomer service.  I would definetely stay here again for its very reasonable price.

I have worked in hotels for about 15 years and have never experienced this kind of service. The staff were rude and their knowledge of simple hotel procedures and amenities was nonexistant.  Dirty stained ceilings and cigarette burns in the bedspread and carpet were not as bad as the crusty stain on the carpet. I don't want to think what it could have been. Overall the worst hotel experience I have encountered. I stay in hotels about 20 times a year or more.  I do not recommend this hotel for even the most cost concious person. Not worth $25.00 let alone a standard rate of $109.00.
